SA11bsa054_u:1371_0: syādetat- satyapi yogināṃ dhiyo viśeṣe prākṛtajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti kathamavagamayituṃ śakyata ityāha dṛṣṭāntenobhayeṣṭeneti-
SA11bsa054_u:1372_5: tathā hi- ye tāvat sarvajanapratipannasvarūpā rūpādayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1372_8: te prākṛtakānāmapi / atastatra ubhayorapi vipratipatterabhāvāt dṛṣṭāntadharmatā na vihanyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1372_9: yeṣāṃ tu mīmāṃsakādīnāṃ deśakālānyathātmakaṃ vastu eva tattathā pratibhāsate iti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:1372_10: te 'nyatra nirākṛtā iti na tanmatamiha nirasyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1372_11: ye tu svayūthyāḥ cittameva vastusat svapnādiṣu tathā pratibhāsate iti manyante,
SA11bsa054_u:1372_15: atastena dṛṣṭāntena viparītavastusvarūpagrāhitayā prākṛtakajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti vyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1373_0: nanu yadi niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvabhāvā iti vastutattvam,
SA11bsa054_u:1373_1: kathaṃ tarhi sarvasattvasamuddharaṇāśayena dānādiṣu saṃbhāraparipūraṇārthaṃ tattvavedināmapi bodhisattvānāṃ pravṛttiḥ? teṣāmapi niḥsvabhāvatvāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1373_3: kāryaṃ sādhyam, upādeyam / phalamucyate / tadarthaṃ tannimittam / avicārataḥ avicāreṇaiva taddhetau pravartanāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1373_4: tathābhūteṣvapi tatra idaṃpratyayatāniyamasya vidyamānatvāt na hetuphalabhāvasya virodhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1373_5: etaduktaṃ bhavati- yadyapi māyādisvabhāvatayā niḥsvabhāvā dānādayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1373_6: tathāpi trikoṭipariśuddhyā sādarādiyogena abhyasyamānāḥ tathābhūtā api paramārthādhigamāya hetubhāvamāpadyante,
SA11bsa054_u:1375_0: avaśyaṃ caitadevam / anyathā mārgābhyāsataḥ samalāvasthāyā nirmalāvasthā,
SA11bsa054_u:1375_2: anyatrāpi samānametat / sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatvāt hetvanurūpaṃ ca sarvatra phalamiṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1375_3: ataḥ sāṃvṛtādapi niḥsvabhāvāddhetoḥ niḥsvabhāvatādhigama eva phalam,
SA11bsa054_u:1375_4: kathamanyathā saṃskṛtādapi [Bcp_180] mārgādaṃsaṃskṛtaṃ nirvāṇamavāpyeta? iti dānādayo vastuto niḥsvabhāvā api paramārthatattvādhigamāya sarvasattveṣu karuṇāyamānairbodhisattvairupādīyante,
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.5_0: lokena bhāvā dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1377_0: lokena prākṛtakajanena / hetupratyayaṃ pratītya bhavanti svarūpaṃ labhante iti bhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1377_3: satsvarūpeṇa na kevalaṃ dṛśyante kalpyante cāpi tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1377_7: na tu māyāvat, na tu punaryathā yoginā māyeva māyāvat svabhāvaśūnyā dṛśyante,
SA11bsa054_u:1377_9: ityatrāsmin vivādo vipratipattiryogilokayoḥ yoginā saha lokasyetyarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1377_10: tatpratipanne vastuttattve lokasyāpratipatteḥ lokena saha vā yoginaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1377_12: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- sarvabhāvānāṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ pāramārthikaṃ ceti rūpadvayamasti,
SA11bsa054_u:1377_13: tatra yat sāṃvṛtaṃ tadeva lokena pratīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1378_0: athāpi syāt- yadetat samastajanasādhāraṇamarthakriyākṣamaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇapratītaṃ vasturūpam,
SA11bsa054_u:1378_1: tat kathamapahrotuṃ śakyata iti parasya hṛdayamāśaṅkayāha pratyakṣamapītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1380_2: tadapi prasiddhayā rūḍhyā lokapravādena na pramāṇataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1380_3: na pramāṇenādhigataṃ sat pratyakṣaṃ rūpādīti saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1383_1: rūpādi tattvaṃ pratyakṣamapi yadi na pramāṇādhigatam,
SA11bsa054_u:1383_2: kathaṃ tatprasiddhiḥ? prasiddhiścet kathaṃ mṛṣetyatrāha aśucyādiṣvityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1384_0: yathā ca paramārthato 'śucini strīkalevarādau tadāsaktiviparyastacetasāṃ śucibuddhirupajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1384_2: sā ca atasmiṃstadgahānmṛṣā / vitathagrāhiṇītyarthaḥ / tadvadiyaṃ rūpādāvapītyaviśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1385_1: āgamāttarhi bhaviṣyati / tathā hi skandhadhātvāyatanādisvabhāvatayā bhagavatā bhāvāḥ sūtre deśitāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1386_0: sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva pañca skandhāḥ, dvādaśāyatanāni, aṣṭādaśaḥ dhātavaḥ / iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1388_1: bhūtiryaiṣāṃ kriyā saiva kārakaṃ saiva cocyate //
SA11bsa054_u:1390_0: lokānāṃ bhāvābhiniveśināṃ skandhādideśanāvaineyānāṃ sattvānāmāpātataḥ śūnyatādeśanānadhikṛtānāṃ śūnyatāyāmavatāraṇārthaṃ sukumāropakrameṇa pravartanāya /
SA11bsa054_u:1390_3: nāthena narakādiduḥkhāt sattvān paritrāyamāṇena abhyudayaniḥśreyasasukhaṃ prāpayatā sattvāśayādivedinā buddhena bhagavatā deśitāḥ prakāśitāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1392_0: yadi na paramārthato deśitāḥ, kathaṃ tarhi te kṣaṇikā ityāha- tattvataḥ kṣaṇikā naite iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1392_1: tattvataḥ paramārthataḥ niḥsvabhāvatvāt kṣaṇikā api na bhavanti ete ime bhāvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1392_3: yadi na tattvataḥ kṣaṇikāḥ, kathaṃ [Bcp_182] tarhi deśanāyāmapi kathitā iti manasi nidhāya [āha] saṃvṛtyā cet [iti]- yadi saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā abhidhīyanta ityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1392_4: ityuttaramāśaṅkaya dūṣayati, tadā virudhyate, saṃvṛtyā kṣaṇikā na paramārthataḥ iti virudhyate na saṃgacchate /
SA11bsa054_u:1392_6: sāṃvyavahāribhirakṣaṇikatvapratīteḥ na kṣaṇikatvaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ rūpamiti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:1393_0: etat siddhāntavādī pariharati na doṣo yogisaṃvṛtyeti-
SA11bsa054_u:1394_2: tayā kṣaṇikatayā pratīteḥ / ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yadi nāma arvāgdarśanaiḥ kṣaṇikatvaṃ na pratīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1394_5: buddhiḥ saṃvṛtirūcyate [9.2] iti vacanāt / na ca pratītibādhitaṃ bādhitameva,
SA11bsa054_u:1395_0: kutaḥ punaretat sāṃvṛtamapi kṣaṇikatvādi yogina eva paśyanti nārvāgdarśina ityāha- lokātte tattvadarśina iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1395_2: hetupadametat / yasmāt tattvadarśinaste, tasmāt kṣaṇikatvanairātmyādi lokāpratītamapi pratipadyante /
SA11bsa054_u:1396_4: aśucibhāvanāsamaye aśucīti striyāḥ kāminyā nirūpaṇe vibhāvanāyāṃ lokabādhā syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1400_0: evamukte subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat- māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1400_2: iti hi māyā ca sattvāśca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
SA11bsa054_u:1401_0: evaṃ kathaṃ tatra satkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpasamudbhava iti parasyābhiprāyamāśaṅkayannāha māyopamādityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1403_1: tadā māyopamānniḥsvabhāvājjinādbhagavataḥ puṇyaṃ sukṛtaṃ pūjāsatkārapādavandanādibhiḥ kathaṃ yathā kathamiveti manyase? upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat /
SA11bsa054_u:1403_3: na hi māyākāranirmitapuruṣasatkārāpakārayoḥ puṇyapāpaprasūtiryukteti parasyā bhiprāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1403_4: atra prāguktamevottaram / tathātra parameva paripṛcchati- sadbhāve 'pi kathaṃ yatheti /
SA11bsa054_u:1403_5: sadbhāve 'pi paramārthasatyatve 'pi bhagavataḥ kathamiva puṇyam? kathaṃ yathetyubhayatrāpi yojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:1403_6: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yathā kasyacit paramārthasato jināt paramārthasat puṇyamupajāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1403_9: iti yadevottaraṃ bhavatām, tadevāsmākamapi, nātiricyate kiṃcit / na ca yuktisiddhaṃ paramārthasad vastusvarūpaṃ kiṃcidastīti pratipāditam /
SA11bsa054_u:1404_0: bhavatu nāma māyopamādapi jināt puṇyam / idaṃ tu kathaṃ samādhīyate ityāha yadi māyopama ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.9_0: yadi māyopamaḥ sattvaḥ kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:1405_1: kā vārtā tarhi sāṃsārikeṣu sattveṣu? te 'pi tatheti brūmaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1405_3: evaṃ sati mahān doṣaḥ prasajyate ityāha- yadītyādi /
SA11bsa054_u:1405_5: tadā kiṃ punarjāyate mṛtaḥ? kimiti praśne akṣamāyāṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:1405_7: kāraṇamatra vaktavyam, naitadyuktamiti vā / nahi māyāpuruṣo vinaṣṭaḥ punarutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1408_0: yāvatkālaṃ pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ mantrauṣadhādīnāṃ sāmagrī samudāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1408_1: samagrāṇi kāraṇāni, tāvatkālaṃ māyāpi vartate, na arvāṅ nivartate, nāpi tataḥ paraṃ pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:1408_7: na tu māyāvadaciraṃ nivartate? uktamatra- yāvatpratyayasāmagrī tāvat pravartate,
SA11bsa054_u:1408_8: yasya tu tathā nāsti, sa nānuvartate iti / api ca / na cirakālāvasthitiḥ samyaktvavyavasthānibandhanamityāha dīrghasaṃtāna ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1409_2: kathamiti pṛcchati- kena prakāreṇa sattvo 'sti vidyate? satyataḥ paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1409_4: sa dīrghakālamanuvartate / yasya tu tathā nāsti, sa nānuvartate iti / na tu tāvatā samyaṅyithyātvam /
SA11bsa054_u:1410_0: evaṃ tarhi yathā māyāpuruṣavadhādau na prāṇātipātaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1412_2: samāne 'pi niḥsvabhāvatve cittasya vijñānasya māyāpuruṣasaṃtāne 'bhāvāt asattvāt na pāpakaṃ na akuśalamutpadyate prāṇātipātādi /
SA11bsa054_u:1412_3: pāpameva pāpakam / svārthe kanvidhānāt / tatrāpi māraṇābhiprāyeṇa prahāraṃ dadato bhavatyeva aśubham,
SA11bsa054_u:1412_4: na tu prāṇātipātaḥ / māyāpuruṣādanyatra kathaṃ prāṇātipāta iti cedāha cittamāyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1413_0: cittameva māyā cittamāyā, tayā samete yukte / māyāsvabhāvena cittena saṃbaddhe ityarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1414_0: yaduktam- cittamāyeti, tat paro vighaṭayannāha mantrādīnāmityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1416_0: mantrādīnām, ādiśabdādauṣadhādīnāṃ cittotpādaṃ prati asāmarthyādavyāpārāt na māyācittasaṃbhavaḥ na māyāsvabhāvaṃ cittaṃ saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1416_1: yathā paravyāmohanibandhanānāṃ māyākāraprayuktānāṃ mantrādīnāṃ prabhāveṇa hastyādyākāranirvṛttiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1418_3: ata eva nānāpratyayasaṃbhavā nānāpratyayāt anekaprakārakāraṇāt saṃbhava utpādo yasyāḥ sā tathoktā /
SA11bsa054_u:1418_7: na hi ekasmin kārye kiṃcit kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti kāryaśabdasāmyāt sarvatra tadeva prakalpayituṃ yujyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1419_0: naikasya kvacidupalabdhasāmarthyasya pratyayasya kāraṇasya hetoḥ sarvasāmarthyaṃ sarvasmin kārye sāmarthyaṃ śaktirasti saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1419_1: kvacidṛṣṭamiti kṛtvā kutraciditi kasmiṃścit samaye deśe kāle vā dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:1419_5: etat sarva lokavyavahārānugataṃ kalpanānirmitaṃ sāṃvṛtaṃ vastutattvamupādaya samutthitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1420_0: etadasahamānaḥ paraḥ punaranyathā prasañjayannāha nirvṛta iti-
SA11bsa054_u:1422_3: jātijarāmaraṇayogī bhavet, tadā ayaṃ mahān virodhaḥ syādityāha buddho 'pi saṃsaredevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1423_0: evamabhyupagamyamāne buddho 'pi sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇato nirvṛto 'pi saṃsaret janmādibhāg bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:1423_1: yata evam, tataḥ tasmāt kāraṇāt kiṃ bodhicaryayā? bodhaye buddhatvāya caryā karacaraṇaśiraḥpradānādyanekaduṣkaraśatalakṣaṇā,
SA11bsa054_u:1423_3: uktakrameṇa vaiphalyāt / sā hi sarvasāṃsārikadharmanivṛttaye sarvaguṇasamuccayāśritabuddhatvaprāptaye ca samāśrīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1424_0: tat pratyuktameva yāvatpratyayasāmagrītyādinā, punarapi vispaṣṭayannāha pratyayānāmityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1425_0: pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānām / anucchede avināśe / hiryasmāt / māyāpi na kevalaṃ saṃsāra iti samuccaye apiśabdaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1425_3: saṃvṛttyāpi kālpanikavyavahāreṇāpi na saṃbhavo na saṃsaraṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:1426_0: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat- yaduktaṃ bhagavatā dharmasvāminā sarvajñena- yo bhikṣavaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:1426_1: sa dharma paśyati / yo dharmaṃ paśyati, sa buddhaṃ paśyati / tatra katamaḥ pratītyasamutpādo nāma? yadidam- avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1426_2: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam / vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam / nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanam /
SA11bsa054_u:1426_4: sparśapratyayā vedanā / vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānam / upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ / bhavapratyayā jātiḥ / jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1426_5: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1426_7: peyālaṃ / evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1426_9: peyālaṃ / ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajātamabhūtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamabhayamahāryamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:1426_10: sa dharmaṃ paśyati / yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ yāvadavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ dharmaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:1426_12: peyālaṃ / tatra avidyā katamā? eteṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ yā ekasaṃjñā piṇḍasaṃjñā nityasaṃjñā dhruvasaṃjñā śāśvatasaṃjñā sukhasaṃjñā ātmasaṃjñā sattvasaṃjñā jīvasaṃjñā jantusaṃjñā manujasaṃjñā mānavasaṃjñā ahaṃkāramamakārasaṃjñā /
SA11bsa054_u:1426_13: evamādi vividhamajñānam, iyamucyate 'vidyā / evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohāḥ pravartante /
SA11bsa054_u:1426_21: sparśānubhavo vedanā / vedanādhyavasānaṃ tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāvaipulyamupādānam / upādānanirjātaṃ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma bhavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1426_24: skandhavināśo maraṇam / mriyamāṇasya saṃmūḍhasya sābhiṣvaṅgasya antardāhaḥ śokaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1427_2: viajñānanārthena vijñānam / mananārthena nāmarūpam / āyadvārārthena ṣaḍāyatanam / sparśanārthena sparśaḥ / anubhavanārthena vedanā / paritarṣaṇārthena tṛṣṇā / upādānārthena upādānam / punarbhavajananārthena [Bcp_187] bhavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1427_4: skandhaparipākārthena jarā / vināśārthena maraṇam / śocanārthena śokaḥ / vacanaparidevanārthena paridevaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1430_0: pratyayānāṃ punarucchede sarvathaiva saṃsaraṇaṃ na syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1430_1: kāraṇavaikalyāt / tataśca 'buddho 'pi saṃsaredevam' ityetanna prasajyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1431_0: evaṃ tāvat sautrāntikādicodyamudasya yogācāravipratipattinirākaraṇāya tanmatena dūṣaṇamudbhāvayannāha yadā na bhrāntirapītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1432_0: yadā sarvaṃ jagat māyātmakatayā svabhāvaśūnyamupagataṃ madhyamakavādibhiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1432_2: tadā māyā kenopalabhyate, kena pratīyate tadgāhakavastusajjñānamantareṇa? naiva kenacidityarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1432_3: yasya punaḥ svacittameva paramārthasat bāhyarūpatayā bhrāntaṃ tathā pratibhāsate,
SA11bsa054_u:1434_0: yadā māyaiva te nāsti tadā kimupalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1435_0: yadā māyaiva grāhyatayā hastyādyākārapravṛtyā tava vijñānavādino nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:1435_2: tadā kimupalabhyate, tadā kimiha pratibhāsate? bahirarthābhāvāddeśādivicchedena pratibhāso na yukta ityarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1436_0: uktamatra cittameva bahīrūpatayā bhrāntaṃ hastyādyākāraṃ pratibhāsate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1436_1: uktameva / kiṃ tu yadyapi cittasyaiva jñānasyaiva sa iti deśādivicchedena grāhyatayā pratibhāsamāna ākāro nirbhāsaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1437_0: yadyapītyabhyupagamyoktam, tathāpi naitat saṃgacchata ityāha cittameva yadā māyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1438_0: cittameva yadā māyā tadā kiṃ kena dṛśyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1439_1: yadā māyā nānyā, na hi vedakacittavyatiriktā kācidanyā māyā nāma,
SA11bsa054_u:1439_4: kiṃ kena pratīyate? darśanameva hi kevalamasti na dṛśyam /

SA11bsa054_u:1494_0: nanu etatsamānaṃ niḥsvabhāvavādino bhavato 'pīti samānadūṣaṇatāmāpādayannāha māyopamatve 'pītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1495_1: māyopamatve māyāsvabhāvatve 'pi jagato jñāte kathaṃ kleśo nivartate,
SA11bsa054_u:1495_3: kimatra prahāṇānupapattikāraṇaṃ yat pṛcchasītyāha yadā māyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1496_0: idamatra prahāṇānupapattibījaṃ dṛśyate- yadā māyāstriyāṃ māyākāravinirmitāyāmabalāyāṃ rāgaḥ saṃraktacittatā jāyate utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1496_1: kasya jāyate? tatkarturapi / na kevalaṃ yadvayāmohanāya sā vinirmitā,
SA11bsa054_u:1496_2: teṣāmeva jāyate, kiṃ tu tasyā māyāstriyāḥ kartuḥ nirmāturapi jāyate iti apiśabdārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1496_3: yadā hi paracittavibhramasaṃpādanārthaṃ mantrauṣadhisāmarthyavinirmitāṃ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgāvayavalakṣaṇaparipūrṇāmabhinavayauvanaśobhāsaṃpatsamāpannāṃ prasannamanoharavarṇāṃ lāvaṇyātiśayaśālinīm atīva tadākāranirmāṇapravīṇaḥ kaścinmāyākāro janapadakalyāṇīṃ striyamupadarśayati,
SA11bsa054_u:1496_4: tadā na tāvat tadanye tāmabhisamīkṣya manmathaśaraprahārāntaravyathitacetaso jāyante,
SA11bsa054_u:1496_5: api tu yo 'pi sa tasyāḥ kamanīyakāntisaṃpadaḥ kāmakalākauśalotkaṇṭhitamūrterabhinirmātā,
SA11bsa054_u:1496_7: so 'pi kāmakalayā paramadaśāmāsādayan na kathaṃcidapi cetaḥ saṃdhārayitumalam,
SA11bsa054_u:1496_8: tat kathaṃ māyopamatve 'pi niścite saṃsārasaṃtaticchedaḥ syāt?
SA11bsa054_u:1498_1: yasmādaprahīṇā anivṛttā / tatkartuḥ māyāstrīnirmātuḥ / kimaprahīṇā? jñeyasaṃkleśavāsanā jñeyasaṃkleśaḥ sasvabhāvatāsamāropādāsaṅgādiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1498_2: vastutāsamāropo vā / jñeyāvaraṇaṃ yāvat / tasya vāsanā anādisaṃsārajanmaparaṃparābhyastamithyāvikalpajanitatadvījabhūtacittasaṃtatisaṃskārādhānam,
SA11bsa054_u:1498_3: tasyā aprahīṇatvāt / nanu etat [Bcp_197] samānaṃ vijñānavādino 'pi pratividhānam /
SA11bsa054_u:1498_4: tasyāpi advayatattvasya sattve 'pi āgantukasaṃkleśavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvāt na sarve tathāgatā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:1498_5: naitat samānam / yasmādabhāvātmāno malāḥ kāryakalāvikalā nāvaraṇaṃ bhavitumarhanti,
SA11bsa054_u:1498_6: ityuktameva / asmākaṃ tu niḥsvabhāvameva janyaṃ janakaṃ ceti na samānam /
SA11bsa054_u:1498_7: sā yasmādaprahīṇā, ato 'smāt kāraṇāt / taddṛṣṭikāle, tasyā jñeyasasvabhāvatāyā dṛṣṭiḥ upalabdhiḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1498_8: tasyāḥ kāle / tasyā vā māyāstriyā dṛṣṭikāle upalambhakāle /
SA11bsa054_u:1498_10: durbalā śūnyavāsaneti śūnyasya śūnyatattvasya śūnyatāyā veti vigrahaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1498_11: chandonurodhād bhāvapratyayasya lopaṃ kṛtvā śūnyeti nirdeśaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1498_12: vāsanā saṃskārādhānam, sa durbalā sāmarthyavikalā, āropitasya darśanāt / atastadā bhāvavāsanā balavatī /
SA11bsa054_u:1499_0: kathaṃ tarhi sā nivartate ityāha śūnyatetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1501_0: śūnyatāyā māyāsvabhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyā vāsanā tasya ādhānam āvedhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1501_5: tasyā bhūtārthatvāt, vastunijasvabhāvatvācca / itarasyā alīkatvāt āgantukatvācca /
SA11bsa054_u:1501_6: nanu bhāvābhiniveśo vā śūnyatābhiniveśo vā iti nābhiniveśaṃ prati kaścidviśeṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1504_1: nāsti na vidyate / caśabdaḥ pūrvāpekṣayā samuccaye /
SA11bsa054_u:1504_2: ityevaṃ cābhyāsāt bhāvavāsanāprahāṇasya paścāt sāpi śūnyavāsanāpi prahīyate nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:1504_3: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- śūnyatāvedho hi bhāvābhiniveśasya pratipakṣatvāt prahāṇopāyabhūtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1504_4: adhigate ca upeye paścāt kolopamatvāt upāyasyāpi prahāṇamanuṣṭhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1506_0: syādetat- yadi nāma kiṃcinnāstīti manasikārābhyāsād bhavati śūnyatāvāsanāyāḥ prahāṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:1506_2: tataśca gaṇḍapraveśe 'kṣitārānirgamo jāta iti tadavasthaṃ tava dauṣṭhayam,
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.34_0: yadā na labhyate bhāvo yo nāstīti prakalpyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1507_3: sa yadi vicāryamāṇo niḥsvabhāvatayā na labhyate na prāpyate taimirikopalabdhakeśastabakavat /
SA11bsa054_u:1507_4: tadā nirāśraya iti / yasyāsau parikalpito bhāvaḥ, tasya saṃbandhino 'bhāvāt nirālambaḥ abhāvaḥ kalpanāvidarśitamūrtiḥ kathaṃ tiṣṭhenmateḥ puraḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1507_5: kathamasau vicāreṇa buddheragrataḥ pratibhāsate? svayameva bhāvaniḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:1508_0: athavā anyathāvatāryate- bhavatu nāma śūnyatābalādhānād bhāvavāsanāvinivṛttiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1508_1: tatpratiṣedhābhāvādabhāvābhiniveśastu kena vāryate ityata āha- yadā na labhyate ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:1509_0: ayamatra samudāyārthaḥ- sarvadharmaśūnyatā hi bhāvābhiniveśaprahāṇāya upādīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1509_4: ata eva etatsamastakalpanājālavinivartanāya bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa adhyātmaśūnyatādayo 'ṣṭādaśa śūnyatāḥ proktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1509_7: anyathā śūnyatāyā bhāvād vyatireke dharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatā na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1510_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairevaṃ pratyavekṣate- na rūpaśūnyatayā rūpaṃ śūnyam,
SA11bsa054_u:1510_1: rūpameva śūnyam, śūnyataiva rūpam / na vedanāśūnyatayā vedanā śūnyā,
SA11bsa054_u:1510_2: vedanaiva śūnyā, śūnyataiva vedanā / na saṃjñāśūnyatayā saṃjñā śūnyā,
SA11bsa054_u:1510_3: saṃjñaiva śūnyā, śūnyataiva saṃjñā / na saṃskāraśūnyatayā saṃskārāḥ śūnyāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1510_4: saṃskārā eva śūnyāḥ, śūnyataiva saṃskārāḥ / na vijñānaśūnyatayā vijñānaṃ śūnyam,
SA11bsa054_u:1511_0: yaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ śūnyatā saiva te matā /
SA11bsa054_u:1512_0: iti na śūnyatā dharmād vyatiriktā / tasmācchūnyatāyāmapi nābhiniveśaḥ kartavyaḥ iti //
SA11bsa054_u:1513_0: evaṃ sarvavikalpapratyastamayāt samastāvaraṇanirmuktirupajāyate ityupadarśayannāha yadā na bhāva ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.35_0: yadā na bhāvo nābhāvo mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1514_0: yadā na bhāvaḥ paramārthasatsvabhāvo materbuddheḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puro 'grataḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1514_1: na abhāvaḥ, nāpi bhāvavirahitalakṣaṇo 'bhāvaḥ yadā mateḥ saṃtiṣṭhate puraḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1514_4: ābhyāmavyatiriktatayā anayoḥ saṃgrahe tāvapi saṃgṛhītāviti nirāśrayā,
SA11bsa054_u:1515_0: kathaṃ tarhi sakalakalpanāvirahādanekakalpāsaṃkhyeyābhilaṣitaṃ parārthasaṃpadupāyabhūtaṃ buddhatvamadhigamya parārthamabhisaṃpādayati bhagavānityatrāha cintāmaṇiriti-
SA11bsa054_u:1516_2: sa yathā vikalpamantareṇāpi lokānāṃ yathābhavyamicchāyāḥ paripūraṇaḥ abhilāṣasya saṃpādakaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1516_4: caturmārajayājjino bhagavān, pāpakadharmajayādvā / jinasya buddhasya bhagavataḥ bimbaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairvirājitaṃ śarīram /
SA11bsa054_u:1516_5: tathā tena prakāreṇa īkṣyate sarvakalpanābhāve 'pi parahitasukhasaṃpādanasamarthaṃ pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1516_9: tadvaśāt / praṇidhānavaśācca, yatpūrvaṃ bodhisattvāvasthāyāmanekaprakāraṃ bhagavatā sattvārthasaṃpādanaṃ praṇihitaṃ tasyākṣepavaśāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1517_0: yasyāṃ rātrau tathāgato 'bhisaṃbuddho yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1517_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? nityaṃ samāhito bhagavān /
SA11bsa054_u:1522_0: evamasādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇamākhyāya punaranyathā hetvavasthāyā eva sa tādṛśaḥ prabhāvāti- śayaviśeṣo yadanābhogena parārthasaṃpādanasamarthaphalamupajāyate iti vṛttadvayenopadarśayannāha yathā gāruḍika ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1523_0: yathā gāruḍiko viṣatatvavit labdhamantrasāmarthyaḥ stambhaṃ kāṣṭhamayaṃ vā anyadvā sādhayitvā mantreṇābhisaṃskṛtya mamābhāvādayameva sarvaviṣāpahāracaturo bhaviṣyatīti vinaśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:1523_2: sa stambhaḥ tenābhimantritaḥ tasmin gāruḍike ciranaṣṭe 'pi prabhūtakālamuparate 'pi viṣādīnupaśāmayet,
SA11bsa054_u:1523_4: chāndasasamayaṃ paripālayatā mito 'pi upadhāyā ṇici hrasvo na kṛtaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1525_2: bodhisattve 'pi nirvṛte iti, bodhiḥ buddhatvam, ekānekasvabhāvaviviktamanutpannāniruddhamanucchedamaśāśvataṃ sarvaprapañcavinirmuktamākāśapratisamaṃ dharmakāyākhyaṃ paramārthatattvamucyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1526_0: dharmato buddhā draṣṭavyā dharmakāyā hi nāyakāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1526_1: dharmatā cāpyavijñeyā na sā śakyā vijānitum //
SA11bsa054_u:1529_1: tasminnirvṛte 'pi / apiśabdo bhinnakramaḥ / apratiṣṭhitanirvāṇatvena paramāṃ śāntiṃ gate 'pi /
SA11bsa054_u:1529_3: iti ubhayathāpi sarvathā kalpanāvirahe 'pi sattvārthasaṃpādanamavikalamupadarśitaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1530_2: kathaṃ tarhi tathāgatapūjā mahāphalā varṇyate ityāśaṅkayannāha acittake ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1531_0: acittake kṛtā pūjā kathaṃ phalavatī bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:1532_0: saṃvṛticittavivikte bhagavati kṛtā upahṛtā pūjā kārāviśeṣaḥ kathaṃ phalavatī bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:1532_1: saphalā syāt? tatra asatyupabhoktari dāyakadānapatīnāṃ kathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet? atrottaramāha tulyaivetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1533_1: yasmāt tiṣṭhato nirvṛtasya ca tasmāt phalavatī bhavediti yojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:1533_2: tiṣṭhato 'parinirvṛtasya / nirvṛtasya nirupadhinirvāṇaṃ gatasya pūjāyā nāsti viśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1533_3: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- dvividhaṃ hi puṇyam- tyāgānvayaṃ ca,
SA11bsa054_u:1533_4: tyāgādeva yadutpadyate / paribhogānvayaṃ ca, deyadharmaparibhogād yadutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1533_5: tatra yadi nāma nirvṛte bhagavati pratigrahīturabhāvāt paribhogānvayaṃ na bhaviṣyati puṇyam,
SA11bsa054_u:1533_6: parityāgānvayaṃ ca kena vāryate? apratigṛhṇati kasmiṃścit kathaṃ parityāgānvayamapi puṇyam? kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ sati pratigrahītari bhavitavyaṃ puṇyena,
SA11bsa054_u:1533_8: idamakāraṇameva / yadi hi puṇyaṃ parānugrahādeva syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1533_11: tathā vyatīte 'pi guṇavati tadbhaktikṛtaṃ svacittādbhavat puṇyaṃ na virudhyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1534_0: api ca sarvapuṇyapāpasadbhāve sarveṣāmāgamaḥ sākṣītyāha āgamāccetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1534_1: āgamācca phalaṃ tatra saṃvṛtyā tattvato 'pi vā /
SA11bsa054_u:1535_0: kimatra upapattyantareṇa? āgamāt bhagavatpravacanāt phalaṃ bhagavatpūjākṛtaṃ mahābhogatādilakṣaṇamavagamyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1535_2: etāvāṃstu viśeṣaḥ- kasyacit tat phalaṃ sāṃvṛtam,
SA11bsa054_u:1535_5: saṃvṛtyā tattvato 'pi vā puṇyapāpakriyāyāḥ phalaṃ bhagavadāgamāt pratīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1535_6: tatra ca āvayoravivāda eva tatra idamuktaṃ bhagavatā puṣpakūṭadhāraṇyām-
SA11bsa054_u:1535_7: ye kecit siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kariṣyanti tiṣṭhato vā parinirvṛtasya vā,
SA11bsa054_u:1535_9: yaśca khalu siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ prasādayet,
SA11bsa054_u:1535_10: prasannacittaḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet upacaret,
SA11bsa054_u:1535_12: yaśca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya sarṣapaphalamātradhātau śarīrapūjāṃ kuryāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1535_14: tathā pūjāyai nāsti viśeṣo nānākaraṇaṃ ca /
SA11bsa054_u:1539_0: yaśca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍita tathāgataṃ varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhopadhānenopatiṣṭhet,
SA11bsa054_u:1539_3: jalena copasiñcet, īṣikāpadaṃ vā dadyāt, nirmālyaṃ vā apanayet, upalepanapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1539_4: āttamanāḥ, ekakramapadavyatihāraṃ vā atikramya vācaṃ bhāṣeta- namastamai buddhāya bhagavate iti,
SA11bsa054_u:1539_5: mā te atra siṃhavikrīḍita kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā,
SA11bsa054_u:1539_6: yadasau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā durgativinipātaṃ gacchet,
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.40_1: satyabuddhe kṛtā pūjā saphaleti kathaṃ yathā //
SA11bsa054_u:1540_0: satyabuddhe paramārthasati bhagavati kṛtā pūjā saphaleti phalavatī,
SA11bsa054_u:1541_1: tatra vaibhāṣikādayaḥ sarvadharmaśūnyatāyāḥ sarvāvaraṇaprahāṇamasahamānāḥ caturāryasatyadarśanabhāvanāṃ ca tadupāyamicchantaḥ prāhuḥ satyadarśanata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1545_0: tatra vṛttasthasya śrutacintāvato bhāvanāyāṃ pravṛttasya aśubhānāpānasmṛtismṛtyupasthānabhāvanā niṣpattikrameṇa anityato duḥkhata śūnyato 'nātmataśca ityetaiḥ ṣoḍaśabhirākāraiḥ duḥkhādisatyaṃ paśyataḥ uṣmagatādicaturnirvedhabhāgīyadvāreṇa duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntyādipañcadaśakṣaṇalakṣaṇasya darśanamārgasya,
SA11bsa054_u:1545_4: tasmādata eva muktirastu, śūnyatādarśanena kim, śūnyatāyāḥ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāyā [Bcp_203] darśanena adhigamena /
SA11bsa054_u:1545_5: sākṣātkaraṇeneti yāvat / kim? na kiṃcit prayojanam / tadaparasya mukterupāyasya vidyamānatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1546_0: na upāyāntaramasti, tasmādityarthaḥ / idaṃ mahārthasya tattvam / tathā hi- sarva eva hi bhāvā āropitamanāropitaṃ ceti rūpadvayamudvahanti /
SA11bsa054_u:1546_5: tacca prajñayā vivecyamānaṃ sarvadharmānupalambhalakṣaṇamavasitamiti sarvadharmaśūnyataiva sarvāvaraṇavibhramaprahāṇāya paṭīyasītyavagamyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1546_6: iti yuktito nirūpitaṃ prāk, nirupayiṣyate ca paścāt / iha punarāgamata eva enamarthamavagrāhayitum-
SA11bsa054_u:1549_0: bhagavānāha- iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati /
SA11bsa054_u:1549_4: yāvat mārgākārajñatāṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati /
SA11bsa054_u:1549_5: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati /
SA11bsa054_u:1549_12: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa bhāvaḥ eṣo 'hamiti dvayorantayoḥ saktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1549_13: dāne śīle kṣāntau vīrye dhyāne prajñāyām /
SA11bsa054_u:1549_15: yaśca dvayorantayoḥ saktaḥ, tasya nāsti mokṣaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñino dānam,
SA11bsa054_u:1549_16: yāvat nāsti prajñā, nāsti mārgaḥ, nāsti jñānam, nāsti prāptiḥ, nāsti abhisamayaḥ, nāstyānulomikī kṣāntiḥ, nāsti rūpasya parijñā, nāsti vedanāyāḥ parijñā, yāvat nāsti pratītyasamutpādasya parijñā /
SA11bsa054_u:1551_1: evametat / ye 'pi te 'bhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1551_3: [Bcp_204] ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanti anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1551_5: ye 'pi te etarhi daśadiglokadhātuṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti,

SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.59_0: nāhaṃ vasā na ca svedo na medo 'strāṇi nāpyaham /
SA11bsa054_u:1622_0: nāhaṃ vasā na ca svedo na meda iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1622_1: vasā śarīrasnehaḥ / svedaḥ prasvedaḥ / medaścaturtho dhātuḥ / imānyapi nāham / antrāṇi nāpyahamiti / antrāṇi prasiddhāni, tānyapi [Bcp_213] nāham / na cāhamantranirguṇḍī antranirguṇḍī sūkṣmātmikā,
SA11bsa054_u:1622_2: sāpi naivāham / gūthamūtramahaṃ na ca, gūthaṃ viṣṭhā / etadapi dvayaṃ nāhaṃ na bhavāmi /
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.60_0: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na ca strāyu noṣmā vāyurahaṃ na ca /
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.60_1: na ca cchidrāṇyahaṃ nāpi ṣaḍ vijñānāni sarvathā //
SA11bsa054_u:1623_0: nāhaṃ māṃsaṃ na ca snāyu noṣmā /
SA11bsa054_u:1623_1: snāyu sirā / ūṣmā śarīratejodhātuḥ / ime 'pi nāham / vāyurahaṃ na ca, vāyurāśvāsapraśvāsādilakṣaṇaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1623_2: so 'pi naivāham / na ca cchidrāṇi cakṣurādīni, tānyapi nāham / nāpi ṣaḍ vijñānāni sarvathā, ṣaṭ cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānāni,
SA11bsa054_u:1623_3: tānyapi nāhaṃ bhavanti / sarvathā sarvaprakāreṇa pratyekaṃ samuditāni vā /
SA11bsa054_u:1623_7: na hi pareṣāmapi ekaikaśaḥ keśādayo 'haṃ pratyayavedyā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:1623_8: samuditā api te eva kevalāḥ pūrvavat /
SA11bsa054_u:1623_9: na ca samuditeṣu teṣu kaścidekaḥ saṃbhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:1623_10: tasya pratiṣetsyamānatvāt / nāpyaneke samuditā api ekapratyayaviṣayā bhavitumarhanti /
SA11bsa054_u:1623_11: na ca anekeṣu ekapratyayo bhrānto yuktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1624_0: santi asmin kāye keśā romāṇi nakhā dantā rajo malaṃ tvakū māṃsāsthi snāyu śirā bukkā hṛdayaṃ plīhakaḥ klomakaḥ antrāṇi antraguṇāḥ āmāśayaḥ pakkāśayaḥ audarīyakaṃ yakṛt purīṣam aśru svedaḥ kheṭaḥ siṃghāṇakaṃ vasā lasikā majjā medaḥ pittaṃ śliṣmapūyaśoṇitaṃ mastakaluṅgaṃ prasrāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1624_1: eṣu ca vastuṣu bodhisattvaḥ upaparīkṣaṇajātīyo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1625_0: syādetat- yadi nāma keśādayo 'haṃpratyayavedyā na bhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:1625_2: yataḥ antarvyāpārapuruṣagocara eva ahaṃpratyayo 'smābhiriṣyate iti naiyāyikādayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1625_3: naitadapi yuktam / yasmāt- ahaṃ gauraḥ kṛśo dīrgho gacchāmītyādyākāraparāmarśātmaka eva ayamahaṃpratyayaḥ pratibhāsate /
SA11bsa054_u:1625_5: na ca anyākāreṇa jñānena anyasya grahaṇaṃ yuktam,
SA11bsa054_u:1625_6: atiprasaṅgāt / tathā hi tadvān, idamidaṃ tasya lakṣaṇamupavarṇayanti pare /
SA11bsa054_u:1625_7: tatra naiyāyikāstāvat nityaṃ sarvagataṃ pratiprāṇibhinnamacetanaṃ cetanāyogāttu cetanaṃ sukhādiguṇādhāraṃ śubhāśubhakarmakartāraṃ tatphalopabhoktāraṃ paralokinaṃ ca ātmānamicchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:1627_4: tadyathā- sarpasya kuṇḍalāvasthānivṛttau ṛjutvāvasthāpravṛttau ca sarpatvasyobhayatrāpyavṛttiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1631_0: kāpilāstu nityaṃ vyāpakaṃ nirguṇaṃ svayameva caitanyātmakamātmānamicchanti,
SA11bsa054_u:1631_4: svayaṃ tatphalopabhoktā vā, niṣkriyatvāt / prakṛtireva tatkartrī tasya, tatphalopanetrī ca / viparyāsavaśādasau svātmani tat samāropayati /
SA11bsa054_u:1631_7: tataḥ śabdādisargaṃ karoti / śabdādiṣu śrotrādivṛttibhirmanasādhiṣṭhitābhiḥ parigṛhīteṣu viṣayeṣu buddhiradhyavasāyaṃ karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:1632_1: ātmanaśca nijaṃ rūpaṃ caitanyaṃ kalpayanti te //
SA11bsa054_u:1632_3: pradhānenopanītaṃ ca phalaṃ bhuṅkte sa kevalam /
SA11bsa054_u:1634_0: upaniṣadvādinastu samastaprāṇisaṃtānāntargatamekameva vyāpi nityaṃ ca jñānamicchanti /
SA11bsa054_u:1634_2: tatsvabhāva eva cātmā / na bāhyaṃ kimapyavayavi paramāṇvādikaṃ grāhyaṃ pramāṇaprasiddhamasti /
SA11bsa054_u:1638_1: tatkathamātmā ahaṃpratyayatayā pratibhāsate ityucyate? tasmād vikalpamātrametat /
SA11bsa054_u:1639_0: saṃprati citsvabhāvātmavādinaḥ sāṃkhyādayaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānāmātmaniṣedhamasahiṣṇavaḥ prāhuḥ- śabdādijñānaṃ cidātmakamātmaivāsmābhirabhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1639_1: tatkathamasyātmatāpratiṣedha ucyate? iti parābhiprāyamākalayya siddhāntavādī prasaṅgamāsañjayannāha-
SA11bsa054_u:1640_0: śabdajñānaṃ yadi tadā śabdo gṛhyeta sarvadā /
SA11bsa054_u:1641_1: tasya ca nityatvāt śabdajñānaṃ nityaṃ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1641_2: tadā śabdo 'pi sadā nityameva tadbhāvābhāvakālayorgrahītavyaḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.61_1: jñeyaṃ vinā tu kiṃ vetti yena jñānaṃ nirucyate //
SA11bsa054_u:1642_0: jñānameva nityamupasthitam, śabdasya tu kādācitkatvāt na sarvadā sattābhivyaktiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1642_1: tataśca tadasattākāle jñeyaṃ vinā viṣayamantareṇa kiuṃ vetti kiṃ jānāti tad jñānam? tuśabdo 'sattākālapraśnaviśeṣe vartate /
SA11bsa054_u:1642_2: yena jñeyena śūnyamapi jñānaṃ nirucyate abhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1644_0: ajānānaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1645_0: yadapi viṣayaṃ na jānāti, tadapi yadi jñānamucyate, tadā kāṣṭhamajñānasvabhāvaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1645_1: na hi tena kiṃcidaparāddhaṃ yena na vijñānaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1645_2: na caivam / tasmādviṣayaparijñānābhāvāt yathā kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:1646_0: yena nirviṣayaṃ na jñānam, tena kāraṇena asaṃnihitajñeyaṃ asaṃnihitamayogyadeśasthaṃ jñeyaṃ grāhyo viṣayo yasya tattathoktaṃ jñānaṃ nāsti na vidyate iti niścayaḥ ekānta eṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1647_2: naitadasti / yato yadasya jñānasya paricchedyaṃ rūpaṃ vyaktamityucyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1647_4: śabdasya tu sadā sattvamasattvaṃ vā na vivakṣitam /
SA11bsa054_u:1647_8: tasya na sarvadā saṃnidhānamastīti kṛtvā iti kathaṃ noktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ? śabdasya yathā sarvadā sattvaṃ nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:1648_0: api ca / yadi śabdajñānamevātmā, tadā tadgrahaṇātmakatvāttasya rūpagrahaṇaṃ na syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1648_1: naitadasti / yataḥ tadeva rūpagrāhakamiṣyate iti cedatrāha tadevetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1649_0: tadeva rūpaṃ jānāti tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi /
SA11bsa054_u:1650_0: tadeva śabdajñānameva yadi rūpaṃ jānātīti matam,
SA11bsa054_u:1650_1: tadā kiṃ na śṛṇotyapi, tadā rūpagrahaṇakāle kimiti na śṛṇotyapi,
SA11bsa054_u:1650_3: atha gṛhṇātyeva, yadi saṃnihitaṃ syāt / kevalamasaṃnidhānāt na doṣa iti parasyottaramāśaṅkayāha śabdasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1651_0: śabdasya viṣayatāmāpannasya asaṃnidhānādayogyadeśāt grahaṇaṃ na syāt- yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:1651_1: evamabhidhīyate, tatastat jñānamapyasat / tat tasmāt tarhi śabdasyāsaṃnidhānāt tat jñānamapi śabdajñānam asadavidyamānam /
SA11bsa054_u:1652_1: kiṃ ca / yadi śabdajñānaṃ tadā rūpagrahaṇādyātmakaṃ tanna yujyate ityāha śabdagrahaṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1654_1: śabdagrāhakamiti yāvat / yat jñānaṃ tad rūpagrahaṇaṃ rūpagrahaṇātmakaṃ katham? na kathaṃcidapi syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1654_3: nanu yathā kaścideka eva kasyacidapekṣayā pitā,
SA11bsa054_u:1654_4: kasyacidapekṣayā ca sa eva putraḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1654_5: tathā prakṛte 'pi rūpadvayamekasya bhaviṣyatītyāha ekaḥ pitetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.64_0: ekaḥ pitā ca putraśca kalpyate na tu tattvataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:1655_0: ekaḥ pitā eva janakaḥ putraśca janyaḥ sa eveti kalpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1655_2: na tu tattvataḥ, na punaḥ paramārthataḥ / eka eva svabhāvaḥ ubhayātmakaḥ kalpanāsamāropitavyapadeśāt [rūpabhedena] punareka eva tathā nānābhidhānena naivābhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1655_6: tasmāt yathā vāstavamekasya dvirūpatvaṃ tanna dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyasti,
SA11bsa054_u:1656_0: ito 'pi na pāramārthiko 'yaṃ vyapadeśa ityāha sattvaṃ raja iti-
SA11bsa054_u:1657_0: sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpi na putro na pitā yataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1658_0: etacca avaśyaṃ tvayāpi svīkartavyam- sāṃkhyamate hi triguṇamekaṃ jagat,
SA11bsa054_u:1658_1: tataḥ sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpīti samudāyaḥ samuccayārthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1658_2: yato yasmādete guṇāḥ svasvabhāvāvasthitāḥ pratyekaṃ samuditā vā /
SA11bsa054_u:1658_6: te eva prāptajanakabhāvā api tena pūrvāparakālayoraviśiṣṭasvabhāvā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:1658_8: na tu tatra kaścidviśeṣaḥ / tataḥ kālpanika evāyaṃ vyavahāraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1658_11: na copalabhyate / tato na tadgrahaṇātmakamityāha śabdagrahaṇetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1659_1: tuśabdo viśeṣābhidhāne / svabhāvastasya rūpagrāhakasya jñānasya nekṣyate na pratīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1660_0: syādetat- yadi nāma na pratīyate, tathāpi tadeva tat / kathaṃ tarhi rūpagrahaṇamityāha tadevetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1662_0: tadeva śabdajñānam / anyena rūpeṇa svabhāvena rūpagrahaṇātmakena rūpaṃ gṛhṇātīti śeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1662_2: yathā nāṭyasamaye raṅgabhūmigato naṭaḥ eka eva [Bcp_218] nānārūpeṇāvatarati,
SA11bsa054_u:1662_4: atrāha- so 'pyaśāśvataḥ iti anityaḥ pūrvasvabhāvaparityāgena rūpāntaramāviśati /
SA11bsa054_u:1662_5: na ca pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāva eva naṭo nānārūpasaṃbandhāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1662_7: iti sādhyavikalo dṛṣṭāntaḥ / athāpi syāt- bhāvaḥ sa eva / svabhāvaḥ punarasya aparāpara utpadyate nirudhyate ca /
SA11bsa054_u:1663_0: sa evātmā naṭo vā / anyasvabhāvaḥ aparasvabhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1663_1: ced yadi ucyate, tadā apūrveyaṃ tadekatā, apūrveyamadṛṣṭapūrveyamīdṛśī tadekatā /
SA11bsa054_u:1663_6: na hi bhāvo nāma anya eva svabhāvāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1663_7: yena tasyotpādanirodhayorapi bhāvasya tau na syātām /
SA11bsa054_u:1663_8: nāpi tadabhinnasya svabhāvasya utpādanirodhayorbhāvasya tādavasthyaṃ yuktamabhedābhāvaprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1664_0: syādetat- bhavatveva eṣa prasaṅgaḥ yadi rūpadvayamasyātmanaḥ satyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1664_1: kiṃ tarhi nijamasya rūpamapahāya aparaṃ rūpamatāttvikam,
SA11bsa054_u:1666_1: iti cedyadi, tarhi nijaṃ tadrūpamucyatām nijaṃ svābhāvikaṃ tasyātmano rūpaṃ tattvamucyatām /
SA11bsa054_u:1670_1: yadi vā avāntaraṃ bhedanibandhanaṃ viśeṣamapāsya kiṃcidākārakamāśritya ekatvamucyate tadā cetanā puruṣadharmaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1670_2: acetanā prakṛtyādidharmaḥ / cakāro doṣāntarasamuccaye / te 'pi ekamabhinnaṃ vastu syātām /
SA11bsa054_u:1670_3: katham? tayoścetanācetanayoḥ yena kāraṇena astitā samā /
SA11bsa054_u:1671_0: nanu ca / atrāpi sādṛśyanibandhanamiṣyate eva ekatvaṃ vastubhede 'pi /
SA11bsa054_u:1672_0: dūṣaṇāntaradyotane cakāraḥ / viśeṣo bhedaḥ sarvabhāvānāmaniyamena yadā mithyā asatyam [tyaḥ?],
SA11bsa054_u:1672_1: nijameva rūpaṃ satyam, tadā kaḥ sādṛśyāśrayaḥ syāt? kimāśritya sādṛśyaṃ vyavasthāpyate? viśeṣasadbhāve hi kiṃcinmātrasādharmyeṇa sādṛśyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1672_2: viśeṣābhāve ca tadeva tat syānna sadṛśam /
SA11bsa054_u:1672_3: na hi gogavayayorgoviśeṣamananubhavan na gavayo gosadṛśo bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:1672_4: api tu gaureva syāt / ato viśeṣa eva sādṛśyāśrayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1672_5: sa ca yadā pāramārthiko na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:1672_6: tadā kaḥ sādṛśyasya samānākāratāyāḥ puṃsāmanyasya vā āśrayo nibandhanaṃ vā bhavet? naiva kaścidityarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1672_8: na sādṛśyakṛtam / tat kathaṃ siddhasādhanādadoṣa ityucyate?
SA11bsa054_u:1676_5: tasmāt / acetanatvādityarthaḥ / kathamiva? paṭādivat / yathā paṭavṛkṣaparvatādayaḥ caitanyavirahādātmā na bhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:1676_8: na ca acetanasya tadyuktam, yathā paṭādeḥ / yadi nāma svayamasāvacetanaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1676_10: tenāyamadoṣaḥ iti parābhiprāyaṃ saṃbhāvayannāha atha jña ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1677_0: atheti pṛcchāyām / athāyamātmā cetanāyogād buddhisamavāyāt svayamacetano 'pi jño bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1677_3: yadā tarhi madamūrcchāvasthāyāṃ cetanānivṛttau ayamātmā ajño na kiṃcidapi jānāti,
SA11bsa054_u:1680_2: acetanasya sarvakālamavikṛtasya sataḥ asyātmanaḥ caitanyena buddhisamavāyena kiṃ kṛtam,
SA11bsa054_u:1681_0: ajñasya kiṃcidapi hitāhitaṃ jñātumaśaktasya niṣkriyasya nirgato bahirbhūtaḥ kriyāyā iti niṣkriyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1681_2: athavā sarvakarmaṇi śaktivikalasya gamanādhikriyāśūnyasya vā ākāśasya prakṛtānupayogitvādākāśakalpasya /
SA11bsa054_u:1681_4: etacca svamatenodāharaṇam / yathā niḥsvabhāvatayā sarvakriyāśūnyaṃ prajñaptisanmātramākāśam,
SA11bsa054_u:1681_5: tathā ātmāpītyarthaḥ / paramatenāpi vā / yathā ca na karmakartrādirūpamākāśamacetanatvādakriyatvācca,
SA11bsa054_u:1682_0: idānīṃ punaranyathā ātmapratiṣedhabādhakaṃ paramatenotthāpayannāha na karmetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1684_1: tadā tenātmanā paralokagāminā vinā antareṇa karmaphalasaṃbandho 'yuktaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1684_2: karma śubhāśubham, phalaṃ ca tasyaiva iṣṭāniṣṭalakṣaṇam,
SA11bsa054_u:1684_3: tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ / karmaṇaḥ kṛtasya phalena vā saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1684_4: yenaiva kṛtaṃ karma, tasyaiva tatphalapratilambho nānyasyeti /
SA11bsa054_u:1684_5: na yukto na ghaṭate / iṣyate ca paraloke karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1685_0: anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma, ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na hi bhikṣavaḥ kṛtopacitāni karmāṇi pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante nābdhātau na tejodhātau na vāyudhātau /
SA11bsa054_u:1687_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
SA11bsa054_u:1688_4: kathamasati ātmani karmaphalasaṃbandho ghaṭate ityāha karma kṛtvetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.71_0: karma kṛtvā vinaṣṭe hi phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa054_u:1689_0: hi yasmāt karma kṛtvā karmotpādya śubhāśubhalakṣaṇam /
SA11bsa054_u:1689_2: phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati / ātmano 'sattve paralokagāminaḥ kasyacidabhāvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1689_5: kṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ sugatau durgatau vā sukhaduḥkhātmakaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati utpatsyate? naiva kasyacit syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1689_6: paraloke ca kṛtakarmaṇa eva phalayogino 'nyasya kasyacidutpādāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1690_0: upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat / smṛtipratyabhijñānasaṃśayanirṇayasvayaṃnihitapratyanumārgaṇadṛṣṭārthakutūhalaviramaṇakāryakāraṇabhāvatadadhigatapramāṇabandhamokṣādayo 'pi na syuḥ cedyadi matam,
SA11bsa054_u:1692_0: dvayorapyāvayoḥ / ātmavādino bhavataḥ, mama ca nairātmyavādinaḥ / siddhe niścite / ke siddhe? āhabhinnādhāre kriyāphale karma kriyā asmin bhave,
SA11bsa054_u:1692_1: tasyāḥ phalaṃ paraloke / te bhinnādhāre nānādhikaraṇe siddhe /
SA11bsa054_u:1692_2: tathāhi- na yenaiva śarīreṇa tasmin janmani karma karoti,
SA11bsa054_u:1692_4: ataḥ anyadeva karmakartṛ, tadanyacca phalabhoktṛ / ato bhinnādhāre kriyāphale bhavataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1692_6: syādetat- ātmavyāpāramantareṇa te eva kartṛtvopabhoktṛtve na syātāmityatrāha-
SA11bsa054_u:1693_0: nirvyāpāro vyāpārarahitaḥ / tatra tayoḥ karmakriyāphalopabhogayoḥ ātmā niṣkriyatvādacetanatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1695_1: iti hetoratrātmani nirvyāpāre vādo vivādo vṛthā niṣphalaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1696_0: nanu yadi ātmā na bhavet, kathaṃ tarhi kṛtavipraṇāśādidoṣo na syāt? tato na vṛthā tadvāda ityāha hetumānityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1698_1: yo hetumān karmaṇā yuktaḥ, sa eva phālayogī phalasaṃbaddhaḥ iti evameṣa saṃbhavo na dṛśyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1699_0: anya eva mṛto loke jāyate anya eva hi /
SA11bsa054_u:1700_1: etattarhi kathaṃ nīyate yaduktam- anenaiva kṛtaṃ karma,
SA11bsa054_u:1701_0: saṃtānasya uttarottarānekakṣaṇaparaṃparālakṣaṇasya kāryakāraṇabhāve na pravartamānasya aikyamāśritya anekeṣu ekatvaṃ lokādhyavasāyavaśādāropitameva nimittīkṛtya kartā bhoktā iti deśitam- ya eva karmaṇaḥ kartā sa eva tatphalasyopabhoktā ca /
SA11bsa054_u:1701_4: ata eva ca tatraivoktam- upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu vipacyante iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1701_5: tathā cetanā karma, cetayitvā karma iti vacanācca /
SA11bsa054_u:1702_0: karmajaṃ lokavaicitryaṃ cetanā tatkṛtaṃ ca tat /
SA11bsa054_u:1704_1: karmajaṃ hi jagaduktamaśeṣaṃ karma cittamavadhūya na cāsti //
SA11bsa054_u:1705_2: tadapi tadāhitavāsanamuttarottaratadabhisaṃskṛtakṣaṇaparaṃparāvicchedataḥ saṃtānapravartamānaṃ pariṇativiśeṣamupagacchat karmaviśeṣānurūpaṃ tathāvidhaṃ sukhādisvabhāvaṃ cittātmakameva phalamabhinirvartayati paraloke /
SA11bsa054_u:1705_3: tadyathā kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparopasarpaṇapratyayaviśeṣāt samadhigatātiśayatayā prathamakṣaṇopanipātinaḥ svopādeyabhūtadvitīyakṣaṇakalāpe kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣotpādanadvāreṇa taduttarottaratāratamyamupajanayantaḥ saṃtatipariṇāmaviśeṣādantyakṣaṇalakṣaṇaṃ prakarṣaparyantamāsādayanto bījānurūpaśālikodravāṅkuramutpādayanti /
SA11bsa054_u:1705_4: yathā ca lākṣārasaparibhāvitaṃ mātuluṅgādibījamuptaṃ tatsaṃskāraparaṃparāpravṛtteḥ tatpuṣpādiṣu raktatāmutpādayati,
SA11bsa054_u:1705_5: na ca tatra kaścit pūrvāparakālayoreko 'nugāmī samasti /
SA11bsa054_u:1706_2: phalaṃ tatraiva badhnāti karpāse raktatā yathā //
SA11bsa054_u:1707_0: tasmādyathā bījādiṣu ātmānamantareṇāpi pratiniyamena kāryaṃ tadutpattiśca krameṇa bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:1707_1: tathā prakṛte 'pi paralokagāminamekaṃ vināpi kāryakāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt pratiniyatameva phalam,
SA11bsa054_u:1707_2: kleśakarmābhisaṃskṛtasya saṃtānasya avicchedena pravartanāt paraloke phalapratilambho 'bhidhīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1707_5: yathā ca satyevātmani sa na ghaṭate,
SA11bsa054_u:1710_0: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ asti karma, asti phalam / kārakastu nopalabhyate ya imān skandhān vijahāti,
SA11bsa054_u:1710_1: anyāṃśca skandhānupādatte, anyatra dharmasaṃketāt / atrāyaṃ dharmasaṃketaḥ, yadasmin sati idaṃ bhavati, asyotpādādidamutpadyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1711_0: etena bhagavataiva idaṃpratyayatāmātralakṣaṇaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo 'pi darśita eva /
SA11bsa054_u:1711_1: ayamapi ca saṃtānasyetyanena [saṃtāna eka ityanena] yathāvyavahāramanirūpitasvarūpaḥ sūcita eva,
SA11bsa054_u:1712_1: dṛṣṭā śaktirmatā sā cetsaṃvṛtyāstu yathā tathā //
SA11bsa054_u:1713_3: na ca atra smarturabhāve 'pi kaścid vyāghātaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1713_4: anubhūte hi vastuni vijñānasaṃtāne smṛtibījādhānāt kālāntareṇa saṃtatiparipākahetoḥ smaraṇaṃ nāma kāryamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1713_6: ativistarabhayāt pratyekamiha na pratividhīyante iti tatsamarthanamanyatraiva vistareṇāvadhāryamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:1714_2: paramārthe tu sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatvāt sarvavikalpoparamācca na kiṃcidutpadyate vā nirudhyate vā sātmakamanātmakaṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:1714_4: nāpi ihaloko na paraloko vā na kaścidasti,
SA11bsa054_u:1714_5: kalpanāviṭhapitatvāt / tasmāt sarvametat pratibimbasaṃnibhaṃ niḥsvabhāvamutpadyate nirudhyate ca /
SA11bsa054_u:1714_6: kāryakāraṇaṃ ca sātmakaṃ nirātmakaṃ ca nityamanityaṃ cābhidhīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1714_7: svapnavat karmakartṛtvam, tatphalopabhogaḥ, ihalokaḥ, paralokaḥ, sugatidurgatigamanaṃ ca kalpanānāmaprahāṇāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1715_0: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti tattvataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1717_2: na kartāsti na bhoktāsti puṇyāpuṇyaṃ pratītyajam /
SA11bsa054_u:1717_3: yatpratītya na tajjātaṃ proktaṃ vācaspate tvayā //
SA11bsa054_u:1719_0: bhagavānāha- evameva mahārāja bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjanaścakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyasthānīyāni abhiniviśate /
SA11bsa054_u:1719_2: samanunītaḥ saṃrajyate / saṃrakto rāgajaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti trividhaṃ kāyena,
SA11bsa054_u:1719_3: caturvidhaṃ vācā, [trividhaṃ manasā] / tacca karmābhisaṃskṛtamādita eva kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇataṃ na pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
SA11bsa054_u:1719_4: na dakṣiṇām, na paścimām, nottarām, nordhvam, nādhaḥ, nānuvidiśam, neha, na tiryak, nobhayamantarā / tat punaḥ kālāntareṇa maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite jīvitendriyanirodhe āyuṣaḥ parikṣayāt tatsabhāgasya karmaṇaḥ kṣīṇatvāt caramavijñānasya nirudhyamānasya manasa ārambaṇībhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1719_6: iti hi mahārāja caramavijñānenādhipatinā tena ca karmārambaṇena aupapattyaṃśikaṃ dvayapratyayaṃ prathamaṃ vijñānamutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1719_7: yadi vā nārakeṣu, yadi vā tiryagyonau, yadi vā yamaloke, yadi vā āsurakāye, yadi vā manuṣyeṣu, yadi vā deveṣu / tasya ca prathamavijñānasya aupapattyaṃśikasya samanantaraniruddhasya anantaraṃ sabhāgā cittasaṃtatiḥ pravartate,
SA11bsa054_u:1719_12: tatropapattiriti / iti mahārāja na kaściddharmo 'smāllokāt paralokaṃ gacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:1719_13: cyutyupapattī prajñāyete / tacca mahārāja caramavijñānamutpadyamānaṃ na kutaścidāgacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:1719_21: karma karmaṇā śūnyam, prathamavijñānaṃ prathamavijñānena śūnyam,
SA11bsa054_u:1719_22: cyutiścyutyā śūnyā, upapattirupapattyā śūnyā / karmaṇāṃ ca avandhyatā prajñāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1719_23: / na tatra kaścit kartā, na bhoktā, anyatra nāmasaṃketāt // iti vistaraḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:1722_1: evamavidyāyāṃ satyāṃ trividhāḥ saṃskārā abhinirvartante puṇyopagāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1722_13: yajjātīyaḥ sparśo bhavati tajjātīyā vedanā pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:1722_15: yastāṃ vedayati, viśeṣeṇāsvādayati, abhinandayati, adhyavasyati, adhitiṣṭhati, sā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇetyucyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1722_16: āsvadanā, abhinandanā, adhyavasāyasthānam, ātmapriyarūpasātarūpairviyogo mā bhavatviti aparityāgo bhūyo bhūyaśca prārthanā,
SA11bsa054_u:1722_18: evaṃ prārthayamānaḥ punarbhavajanakaṃ karma samutthāpayatti kāyena vācā manasā,
SA11bsa054_u:1722_32: tatra karmaṇāṃ naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījasya kṣetrakāryaṃ karomi /
SA11bsa054_u:1722_33: [Bcp_226] tṛṣṇāyāṃ api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījaṃ snehayāmīti /
SA11bsa054_u:1722_34: avidyāyā api naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ vijñānabījamavakirāmīti /
SA11bsa054_u:1722_36: api tu vijñānabījaṃ karmakṣetrapratiṣṭhitaṃ tṛṣṇāsnehābhisyanditam avidyāvakīrṇaṃ virohati,
SA11bsa054_u:1722_38: sa ca nāmarūpāṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1722_39: atha ca mātāpitṛsaṃyogādṛtusamavāyādanyeṣāṃ ca pratyayānāṃ samavāyādāsvādanānuprabaddhaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1722_40: peyālaṃ / na tatra kaściddharmo 'smāllokāt paralokaṃ saṃkrāmati /
SA11bsa054_u:1722_41: asti ca karmaphalam, asti ca vijñaptiḥ, hetupratyayānā mavaikalyāt / peyālaṃ / yathā agnirupādānavaikalyānna jvalati,
SA11bsa054_u:1722_42: upādānāvaikalyācca jvalati, evameva karmakleśajanitaṃ vijñānabījaṃ tatratatropapattyāyatanapratisaṃdhau mātuḥ kukṣau nāmarūpāṅkuramabhinirvartayati asvāmikeṣu dharmeṣu amameṣu aparigraheṣu apratyarthikeṣu ākāśasameṣu māyālakṣaṇasvabhāveṣu hetupratyayānāmavaikalyāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1723_4: kathaṃ na śāśvatataḥ? yasmādanye māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1723_6: na tu ya eva māraṇāntikāḥ skandhāḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1723_8: ato na śāśvatataḥ / kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddheṣu māraṇāntikeṣu skandheṣu aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:1723_9: nāpyaniruddheṣu / api tu māraṇāntikāḥ skandhā nirudhyante,
SA11bsa054_u:1723_10: tasminneva ca samaye aupapattyaṃśikāḥ skandhāḥ prādurbhavanti,
SA11bsa054_u:1723_11: tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat / ato nocchedataḥ / kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśāt sattvanikāyādvisabhāgāḥ skandhā jātyantare 'bhinirvartante /
SA11bsa054_u:1723_12: ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ / kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ? parīttaṃ karma kriyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1724_0: tadevamātmādivirahe 'pi karmaphalasaṃbandho 'vikalaḥ sūtreṣu bhagavatā svayamupadarśita ityupadarśitaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1726_0: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:1726_1: ātmanā hi sudāntena svargaṃ prāpnoti paṇḍitaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:1728_0: cittasya damanaṃ sādhu cittaṃ dāntaṃ sukhāvaham /
SA11bsa054_u:1729_0: iti cittasya damanavacanāt / tadapi ca ātmadṛṣṭayabhiniviṣṭānāmanyatrātmagrāhaparikalpavicchedārthaṃ neyārthatayā saṃvṛtyā cittamātmeti prakāśitaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1731_0: iti, tadapi vyākhyātaṃ bhavati / yataḥ tadapi ca anyatra pudgalādyabhiniveśabādhanāya vacanam /
SA11bsa054_u:1732_1: tathāpi na vastutaḥ tadahaṃkāragocara ityupadarśayannāha atītetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1733_0: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1734_0: tridhā hi cittaṃ saṃbhavati parikalpamupādāya atītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca /
SA11bsa054_u:1734_1: tatra / atītānāgataṃ naṣṭājātaṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ na ahaṃdarśanaviṣayaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1734_2: kutaḥ? hiryasmāt / tadatītā nāgataṃ cittaṃ na vidyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1734_3: na saṃpratyasti, naṣṭājātatvāt / yadatītaṃ tat kṣīṇaṃ niruddhaṃ vigataṃ vipariṇāmitam /
SA11bsa054_u:1734_4: yadanāgatam, tadapyasaṃprāptamiti / pratyutpannaṃ tarhi cittamahaṃ bhaviṣya tītyata āha-
SA11bsa054_u:1735_1: tadapi na yuktam / yato naṣṭe 'sminnāstyahaṃ punaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1735_2: asmin pratyutpanne citte naṣṭe dvitīyakṣaṇe atīte sati nāstyahaṃ punaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1735_5: tat kutaścittamālambyatāṃ yena ālambanaṃ syāt? ato na cittālambano 'pīti nirālambana evāyamahaṃpratyaya utpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1736_1: nāpi cittamahaṃkārasya viṣaya iti prasādhyopasaṃharannāha yathaivetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1737_2: bhāgaśaḥ pratyavayavaśaḥ kṛto 'vadhūto na kaścit na vastusan prāpyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1739_0: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet /
SA11bsa054_u:1740_0: yadi sarvathaiva sattvaḥ ātmā pudgalo vā vicāryamāṇo na vidyeta,
SA11bsa054_u:1740_1: na syāt, tadā kasyopari kṛpā karuṇā bodhisattvānāṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa054_u:1740_2: sattvamantareṇa kimālambya pravarteta? karuṇā ca samyaksaṃbodhisādhanam,
SA11bsa054_u:1741_0: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat- na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:1741_1: eka eva dharmo bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ kartavyaḥ supratibiddhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1741_5: evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā gacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:1741_7: tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:1741_8: evameva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyāṃ bodhikārakāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavatīti /
SA11bsa054_u:1743_1: kimadhiṣṭhānā? mañjuśrīrāha- mahākaruṇārambhā devaputra bodhisattvānāṃ caryā sattvādhiṣṭhānā /
SA11bsa054_u:1744_0: tasmādavaśyaṃ prathamataḥ sattvālambanā karuṇābhyupagantavyāḥ duḥkhitasattvādhiṣṭhānena samutpatteḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1744_1: sattvābhāve ca sā na syāditi cet,
SA11bsa054_u:1744_2: evaṃ manyase yadi, tadā naitadvaktavyamityāha kāryārthamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1745_1: tadarthamabhyupetena svīkṛtena mohena saṃvṛtyā yaḥ prakalpitaḥ samāropitaḥ sattvaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1745_2: tasyoparītyarthaḥ / tathāhi sakalakalpanājālarahitaṃ sarvāvaraṇavinirmuktaṃ paramapuruṣārthatayā buddhatvamiha sādhyam /
SA11bsa054_u:1745_7: sā ca prathamato duḥkhitasattveṣu pravartamānā saṃbhārārambhanidānamupapadyate iti kāryārthaṃ mohasya saṃvṛtisatyarūpasyābhyupagamaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1745_9: tataḥ paraṃ dharmālambanā, anālambanā ca / ayamabhiprāyaḥ- na sarvathā sattvasyābhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1746_1: ye kecidbhikṣavaḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā ātmeti samanupaśyantaḥ samanupaśyanti imānete (tān?) pañcopādānaskandhān /
SA11bsa054_u:1747_0: tato yadi nāma prajñayā nirūpayataḥ paramārthataḥ sattvānupalambhaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1748_0: yataḥ prajñā tattvaṃ bhajati karuṇā saṃvṛtimataḥ
SA11bsa054_u:1748_3: tadā te 'bhūdārte suta iva pituḥ prema jagati //
SA11bsa054_u:1750_0: sattvasaṃjñā ca te nātha sarvathā na pravartate /
SA11bsa054_u:1751_0: tasmādamī rūpādaya eva saṃvṛtyā sattvaśabdenocyante / iti na karuṇā nirviṣayā //
SA11bsa054_u:1752_0: nanu paramārthataḥ sattvābhāve kasya tat kāryam,
SA11bsa054_u:1752_1: iti kathaṃ tatsādhanāya kasyacit pravṛttirityabhisaṃdhāya āha kāryamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1753_0: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1754_0: na cet sattva iti / yadi sattvo nāsti, tadā ekasyānuyāyino 'bhāvāt rūpādīnāṃ ca utpannavināśitvāt kāryaṃ kasya? na kasyacit syādityarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1754_1: satyamityabhyupagame iti / evameva etanmatameva asmākam- naiva kasyacit paramārthataḥ kāryam,
SA11bsa054_u:1754_3: yadyevam, kathaṃ tarhi tatsādhanāya prathamataḥ pravṛttiriti cet,
SA11bsa054_u:1754_4: īhā tu mohataḥ / īhā ceṣṭā punastatkāryārthitayā vyāpāraḥ mohāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1754_5: mamaiva tat kāryaṃ bhaviṣyatītyekatvādhyavasāyena sattvābhāve 'pi saṃvṛtyā māyāsvabhāvatayā /
SA11bsa054_u:1756_1: nanu ca moho nāma avidyāsvabhāvatayā sarvathaiva anupādeyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1756_2: tat kathaṃ punastasyaiva svīkāraḥ ityata āha duḥkhetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1757_1: tatra yaḥ saṃsāranidānam, sa prahātavya eva / anyastu yaḥ paraṃparayā duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ sarvasattvajātyādivyasananimittaṃ [Bcp_230] kāryamohaḥ kāryasya paramārthasatyalakṣaṇasyādhigamāya mohaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1757_2: sa punarna vāryate, na pratiṣidhyate / upādīyate eva, paramārthopayogitvāt / idamihādhikṛtam, tadapi kāryaṃ nātmasukhābhilāṣeṇa mahadbhirupādīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1758_2: tat kimātmā yatnena niṣidhyate? tatsadbhāve 'pi ātmabhāvanayā ahaṃkāraparikṣayāt bhaviṣyati saṃsāranivṛttiḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1760_1: na tathā dvitīya ātmamohaḥ, tasmin sati ahaṃkārakṣayābhāvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1760_3: vṛddha upajāyate / kiṃbhūtaḥ? duḥkhahetuḥ duḥkhasya sāṃsārikasya triduḥkhatālakṣaṇasya hetuḥ kāraṇam /

SA11bsa054_u:1764_0: tato 'pi ātmadarśanādapi na nivartyo nivartayitumaśakyo 'haṃkāraśced yadi, tadā-
SA11bsa054_u:1765_4: tathāhi tadbhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagamanāt sākṣānnairātmyadarśanāt virodhi satkāyadarśanaṃ nivartate /

SA11bsa054_u:1766_0: tadyathāpi nāma śāntamate vṛkṣasya mūlacchinnasya sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśaṃ śuṣyati,
SA11bsa054_u:1768_1: syādetatyadi nāma ātmā vicāreṇa kharaviṣāṇasadṛśatvānnāhaṃkārasya viṣayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1768_2: tathāpi kāyāvayavī tadviṣayo bhaviṣyatītyatrāha kāyo neti-
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.79_0: kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca /
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.79_1: nodaraṃ nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ noro bāhū na cāpi saḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.80_0: na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.80_1: na grīvā na śiraḥ kāyaḥ kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:1769_0: kāyo 'pi vicāreṇaiko naiva kaścidastītyupadarśayati- tathā hi karacaraṇādayo bhāgā evaṃ paraṃ dṛśyante,
SA11bsa054_u:1769_3: yataḥ kāyo na pādau, na caraṇau, na jaṅghā / jaṅghā ca kāyo na bhavati / norū jaṅghaikadeśaviśeṣau na kāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1769_4: kaṭirna ca, śroṇirapi naiva kāyaḥ / nodaram, jaṭharamapi kāyo na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1769_5: nāpyayaṃ pṛṣṭham, ayaṃ kāyaḥ pṛṣṭhamapi naiva /
SA11bsa054_u:1769_6: noraḥ, noro vakṣo 'pi na kāyaḥ / bāhū na cāpi saḥ, sa kāyo bhujāvapi na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1769_7: na hastau, karāvapi na kāyaḥ / nāpyayaṃ pārśvau, [Bcp_232] ayaṃ kāyaḥ pārśvāvapi na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1769_8: na kakṣau, bhujamūle api na kāyaḥ / nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ, nāpi skandhasvabhāvaḥ kāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1769_9: na grīvā, na kaṃdharā kāyaḥ / na śiraḥ kāyaḥ, mastako 'pi kāyo na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1769_15: tat kāyo 'tra kataraḥ punaḥ, atra eṣu pādādibhāgeṣu purovartiṣu śarīrakalpanānimitteṣu kataraḥ kāyo bhavatu? naiva kaścideko 'pi nirūpyamāṇaḥ kāyātmaka upalabhyate iti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:1770_0: athāpi syāt- naivamabhidhīyate pratyekaṃ karādayaḥ kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1770_1: kiṃ tarhi sarvāvayavavyāpakatvādavayavinaḥ sarvāvayaveṣu vartate ityatrāha yadītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1772_1: yugapat sarvātmanā vā? tatra yadi sarveṣu karacaraṇādiṣu avayaveṣu kāyo 'vayavī,
SA11bsa054_u:1772_2: ekadeśena vartate, kenacid bhāgena kaṃcidavayavaṃ vyāpnoti /
SA11bsa054_u:1772_4: tadā etanna vaktavyam / yataḥ yairekadeśairavayaveṣu vartate,

SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.81_0: aṃśā aṃśeṣu vartante sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:1773_0: aṃśā bhāgāḥ aṃśeṣu svasvabhāgeṣu vartante vyavatiṣṭhante,
SA11bsa054_u:1773_2: sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ? svayaṃ punarasau kāyo 'vayavī kva nu nāma vyavasthitaḥ iti na vidmaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1775_1: avayaveṣu anavakāśatvāt sa ca kutra svayaṃ sthitaḥ iti prasaṅgo nādyāpi nivartate /
SA11bsa054_u:1775_4: ādiśabdāccaraṇādiṣu sthitaḥ samavetaḥ kāyāvayavī cet yadi,
SA11bsa054_u:1775_5: tadā punarayaṃ doṣaḥ syādityāha- kāyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1775_13: nānyathā ekavṛttiḥ syāt / ayaṃ ca prasaṅgaḥ anekatra ekadeśena vṛttipakṣe 'pi yojayitavyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1777_0: naivāntarna bahiḥ kāyaḥ kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu /
SA11bsa054_u:1778_1: adhunā punaravayavinaḥ pratiṣedhāt na bahiḥ na bāhyaḥ pratyakṣādigocaraḥ kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1778_2: iti kathaṃ kāyaḥ karādiṣu vyavasthāpyate? atha karādivyatirikto bhaviṣyatītyāha karādibhya ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.83_0: karādibhyaḥ pṛthaṅ nāsti kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate //
SA11bsa054_u:1779_0: karādibhyo 'vayavebhyaḥ pṛthag bhinnaḥ upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaḥ kāyo nāsti,
SA11bsa054_u:1779_1: na pratibhāsate / karādaya eva hi kevalāḥ pratibhāsante /
SA11bsa054_u:1779_2: evaṃ yo na karādisvabhāvaḥ, nāpi tadādheyaḥ samaveto nāpyantargataḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1779_3: na cāpi tadvayatiriktaḥ, sa kāyaḥ kathaṃ nu khalu vidyate? kathaṃ nviti kathaṃcidapi kāyamanupalabhamānaḥ tatsattvamasaṃbhāvayan pṛcchati- kathaṃ nu kena prakāreṇa /
SA11bsa054_u:1782_2: kathaṃ tarhi karādiṣu kāyabuddhirityāha- mohāttu ityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:1782_3: mohādavidyāvaśāt tu punaḥ kāyabuddhiḥ karādiṣu ekadravyarahiteṣu,
SA11bsa054_u:1782_4: na tu paramārthataḥ / avadhāraṇe vā tuśabdaḥ / tathāhi anavarāgrasaṃsārapravṛttijanmaparaṃparāparicitamithyābhyāsavāsanāvaśāt yathāvasthitavastutattvapratipattāvapi tadviparītasamāropakalpanā upajāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1783_0: kathamanyatra sā na bhavati ityatrāha saṃniveśeti-
SA11bsa054_u:1784_3: na sarvatra sā bhavati / pratiniyataviṣayā hi bhrāntaya iṣyante /
SA11bsa054_u:1784_5: yathā sthāṇau puruṣasvabhāvarahite 'pi puruṣasādhāraṇordhvatādisaṃniveśaviśeṣamupalabdhavato dūrādavivecitaparaviśeṣasya kasyacit vibhramāt puruṣabuddhirupajāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1785_0: syādetat- kathaṃ punaretadavasitaṃ mohāt kāyabuddhiḥ, na tu punarvastutaḥ ityatrāha yāvadityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1787_1: yāvat yāvatkālāvadhiparicchinnā pratyayānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pṛthivyādiṣaḍdhātuṣaṭsparśāyatanāṣṭādaśamanopavicārātmakānāṃ karmāyattavṛttīnāṃ sāmagrī samavadhānam,
SA11bsa054_u:1787_3: yathā puruṣasvabhāvavirahito 'pi paramārthataḥ parikalpitarūpatayā puruṣa iva pratibhāsate vyavahriyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1787_4: upalakṣaṇaṃ caitat / strī vetyapi draṣṭavyam / na pūrvaṃ kalalādyavasthāyāṃ na paścādvikalitatvād bhasmādyavasthāyāṃ nijasvabhāvābhāvāt /

SA11bsa054_u:1797_5: pādo 'pi caraṇo 'pi kataro bhavet? tatsamudāyamantareṇa vicāryamāṇo naiva kaściditi bhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1798_1: kutaḥ? parvasamūhatvāt, parvaṇāmaṅgulibhāgānāṃ samūhatvāt saṃghātatvāt kataro bhavediti prakṛtena saṃbandhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1798_2: parvaṇāmapi pratyekamavastutvamityata āha- parvāpi na vastu /
SA11bsa054_u:1798_3: kasmāt? svāṃśabhedataḥ, svasya ātmanaḥ aṃśānāmavayavānāṃ bhedato 'pi vibhāgāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1801_0: iti / aṃśāḥ parvabhāgāḥ api aṇubhedena paramāṇuśo vibhāgena bhidyamānatvāt kalpitā eva /
SA11bsa054_u:1803_2: dikṣu vā vibhāgāḥ nānādigavasthitā nānārūpāṃśāḥ paramāṇoḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1805_0: iti nyāyāt / tathāhi- pūrvāparādidigavasthitaparamāṇvabhimukhaṃ yat tat paramāṇormadhyavartino rūpam,
SA11bsa054_u:1805_1: tat kimekameva, aparāparaṃ vā? yadi ekameveti pakṣaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1805_4: anyathā rūpabhedaprasaṅgāt / tatsamānadeśatā ca na tatsvarūpāntarbhāvamantareṇa,
SA11bsa054_u:1805_5: tasyāpi pūrvadigavasthitasya paramāṇoraparaparamāṇunā sarvātmanā saṃbandhena tatsvarūpāntarbhāvāt paramāṇumātraṃ dravyaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1805_6: tathā ca sati pracayarūpā bhūdharādayo na syuḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1805_7: ato bhavanādīnāṃ pracayamicchatā dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ samabhyupeyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1805_8: tadā ca ṣaḍbhiraparāpararūpeṇa yugapat saṃbandhāt ṣaḍbhāgo madhyaparamāṇuḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1807_0: te 'pi punaraṇīyāṃso bhāgāḥ tathaiva nirūpyamāṇāḥ nirātmatayā nabhaḥsvabhāvatāṃ pratipadyante ityāha digvibhāgo 'pītyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1808_0: digvibhāgo 'pi digbhedena paramāṇorvibhāgo 'pi pūrvavat ṣaḍaṃśatayā bhidyamānaḥ kataro bhavet? na kiṃcidvastu syāt /
SA11bsa054_u:1808_2: kutaḥ? anaṃśatvāt / ato 'bhinikṛṣyamāṇo niḥsvabhāvatayā ākāśaṃ śūnyameva /
SA11bsa054_u:1808_3: tena kāraṇena nāstyaṇuḥ, na vidyate paramāṇuriti / evaṃ karādayo 'pi vicārato niḥsvabhāvā draṣṭavyā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1808_6: itthaṃ na keśādayaḥ, na cātmā, nāpi cittam, na ca kāyaḥ ahaṃkārasya viṣayo vastutaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1808_7: tasmādavidyāsamutthāpitātmatayā ātmādisattvamantareṇāpi pravartamāno 'yamahamiti pratyayo nirviṣaya eva samutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1810_0: iti, tat samarthitam / sarveṇa caitena kāyasmṛtyupasthānamupadarśitaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1811_0: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattva evaṃ kāyasmṛtimupasthāpayati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ pādapādāṅulijaṅghorutrikodaranābhīpṛṣṭhavaṃśahṛdayapārśvapārśukāhastakalācībāhvaṅgagrīvāhanulalāṭaśiraḥkapālamātrasamūhaḥ karmabhavakārakopacitaḥ nānākleśopakleśasaṃkalpavikalpaśatasahasrāṇāmāvāsaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1811_2: evaṃ bahudravyasamūhaḥ / tat ko 'tra kāyaḥ? tasya pratyavekṣamāṇasya evaṃ bhavati- ākāśasamo 'yaṃ kāyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1811_5: tasya kāyaparijñānahetorna bhūyaḥ kvacit smṛtiḥ prasarati,
SA11bsa054_u:1813_0: ayaṃ kāyo na pūrvāntādāgato nāparānte saṃkrānto na pūrvāntāparāntāvasthito 'nyatrāsadviparyāsasaṃbhūtaḥ kārakavedakarahito nādyantamadhye pratiṣṭhitamūlaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1813_1: asvāmiko 'mamo 'parigrahaḥ / āgantukairvyavahārairvyavahriyate kāya iti deha iti bhoga iti āśraya iti kuṇapa iti āyatanamiti /
SA11bsa054_u:1813_2: asārako 'yaṃ kāyaḥ mātāpitṛśukraśoṇitasaṃbhūtaḥ aśucipūtidurgandhisvabhāvaḥ [Bcp_237] rāgadoṣamohaviṣādataskarākulaḥ nityaṃ śatanapatanabhedanavikiraṇaviṃdhvaṃsanadharmā nānāvyādhiśatasahasranīḍa iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1814_0: evaṃ yadā vicāryamāṇo vastutaḥ śūnyasvabhāvatayā ākāśasaṃkāśaḥ sarvathā kāyaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:1814_1: tadā mithyaiva vastutattvamāropya rāgādikamutpādayantaḥ saṃsāramupabṛṃhayanti bālāḥ ityāhaevamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:1815_0: evaṃ svapnopame rūpe ko rajyeta vicārakaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1816_0: evamityuktakrameṇa svapnopame svapnopalabdhe iva rūpe 'saumanasyasthānīye ko rajyeta,
SA11bsa054_u:1816_1: ka āsajyeta? asya ca upalakṣaṇatvāt ko dviṣyāt,
SA11bsa054_u:1816_2: ko muhyet, ityapi veditavyam / tadyathā- saumanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā rāgo jāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1816_3: daurmanasyasthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā dveṣo jāyate /
SA11bsa054_u:1816_4: upekṣāsthānīyāni cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā moho jāyate iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1816_6: tenāsya rāga utpadyate / pratikūleṣu rūpeṣu pratihataṃ carati,
SA11bsa054_u:1816_7: tenāsya dveṣa utpadyate / naivānukūleṣu na pratikūleṣu saṃmūḍhaṃ carati,
SA11bsa054_u:1816_8: tenāsya moha utpadyate / evaṃ śabdādiṣu trividhamālambanamanubhavati pūrvavat /
SA11bsa054_u:1816_9: tatra yaḥ paṇḍitajātīyaḥ, iti hi atyantayā cakṣurāyatanaṃ śūnyaṃ cakṣurāyatanasvabhāvena tat pūrvāntato 'pi nopalabhyate,
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.88_0: iti hi māyopamānīndriyāṇi svapnopamān viṣayān paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.88_1: tasya kathaṃ rāgādikamutpadyate? ata evāha- vicāraka iti /
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.88_2: vicārako vicakśaṇaḥ / evametadyathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyan ko rajyeta dveṣṭi muhyati vā? atra ca svapnopalabdhajanapadakalyāṇīprabhṛti bhagavatoktaṃ nidarśanamupadarśitavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.88_3: kāyābhāve ca strāyādikalpanayāpi rāgo na yukta ityāha kāyaścetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.88_4: kāyaścaivaṃ yadā nāsti tadā kā strī pumāṃśca kaḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:1817_0: hetusamuccye cakāraḥ / yasmāt stryādikalpanayā rāgo na bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:1817_2: niḥsvabhāvaḥ, tadā kāyābhāvāt kā strī kāminī yasyāḥ kamanīyatayā puruṣe rāgo bhavet? kaśca pumān kāmukaḥ yasya rañjanīyatayā striyāṃ rāgo bhavet? strī hi svātmani strīti saṃkalpya bahirdhā puruṣe puruṣa iti rāgaṃ janayati /
SA11bsa054_u:1817_3: evaṃ puruṣo 'pi svātmani puruṣa iti saṃkalpya bahirdhā striyāṃ strīti rāgaṃ janayati /
SA11bsa054_u:1817_4: kāyābhāve tu striyāṃ strīti na saṃvidyate,
SA11bsa054_u:1817_7: na tat strī na puruṣa iti / tasmādasati kāye stryādikalpanākṛto 'pi na yujyate rāgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1817_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? manyanāpagatā hi sarvadharmā iti /
SA11bsa054_u:1818_2: ṣaṭsparśāyatanaḥ, aṣṭādaśamanopavicāraḥ / ṣaḍdhāturayaṃ mahārāja puruṣa iti khalu punaretad yuktam /
SA11bsa054_u:1818_3: kiṃ caitat pratītya kam? ṣaḍime mahārāja dhātavaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:1818_5: abdhātuḥ, tejodhātuḥ, vāyudhātuḥ, ākāśadhātuḥ, vijñānadhātuśca / ime mahārāja ṣaḍ dhātavaḥ / yāvat ṣaḍimāni mahārāja sparśāyatanāni /
SA11bsa054_u:1818_6: katamāni ṣaṭ? cakṣuḥsparśāyatanaṃ rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya yāvanmanaḥsparśāyatanaṃ dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāya /
SA11bsa054_u:1818_9: katame aṣṭādaśa? iha puruṣaḥ cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā saumanasyadaurmanasyopekṣāsthānīyāni rūpāṇyupavicarati /
SA11bsa054_u:1818_10: evaṃ śrotrādiṣu vācyam / tena pratyekamindriyaṣaṭkena saumanasyāditrayabhedādaṣṭādaśa manaupavicārā bhavanti /
SA11bsa054_u:1818_11: peyālaṃ / katamaśca mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ? yat kiṃcidasmin kāye 'dhyātmaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatamupāttam /

SA11bsa054_u:1818_13: katamaśca mahārāja bāhyaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ? yat kiṃcid bāhyaṃ kakkhaṭatvaṃ kharagatamupāttam /
SA11bsa054_u:1818_15: tatra mahārāja ādhyātmikaḥ pṛthvīdhātuḥ utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
SA11bsa054_u:1818_17: bhavati mahārāja samayo 'yaṃ yat strī adhyātmaṃ [ahaṃ] strīti kalpayati /

SA11bsa054_u:1818_24: yaśca saṃkalpayitā, ubhayametanna saṃvidyate / striyāṃ strī na saṃvidyate / puruṣe puruṣo na saṃvidyate /

SA11bsa054_u:1819_0: evaṃ kāyasmṛtyupasthānaṃ pratipādya vedanāsmṛtyupasthānamupadarśayituṃ vedanāṃ vicārayannāha yadyastītyādi-

SA11bsa054_u:1824_1: vedyate iti hi vedanocyate, vedanānubhava iti vacanāt / yadi ca avedyamānāpi vedanā syāt,

SA11bsa054_u:1826_3: nanu, nanviti parasya saṃbodhane / iti mataṃ bho tava, na hi sūkṣmatā nāma duḥkhasya sātānubhavakāle kācidupalabhyate /

SA11bsa054_u:1855_0: sukhaduḥkhasādhanaprāptiparihārāya yo 'yamāyāsaḥ kriyate sa kimarthaḥ? ākāśacarvaṇārthamiva naivocita iti bhāvaḥ /

SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.99_1: tadāvasthāmimāṃ dṛṣṭvā tṛṣṇe kiṃ na vidīryase //

SA11bsa054_u:1859_1: vedanā ca nāsti, kenāyaṃ tarhi sukhasādhanatvādinā bhāveṣu dṛṣṭādivyavahāraḥ pravartate ityatrāha dṛśyate ityādi-
