SA11bsa054_u:2100_0: tatra kathaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ paśyati? ihoktaṃ bhagavatā- ya imaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvaṃ yathāvadaviparītamajīvamajātamabhūtamakṛtamasaṃskṛtamapratighamanālambanaṃ śivamabhayamanāhāryamavyayamavyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati,
SA11bsa054_u:2100_1: sa dharmaṃ paśyati / yastu evaṃ satatasamitaṃ nirjīvam- ityādi pūrvavat yāvat- avyupaśamasvabhāvaṃ paśyati so 'nuttaradharmaśarīraṃ buddhaṃ paśyati /
SA11bsa054_u:2100_3: pratītyasamutpāda iti kasmāducyate? sahetukaḥ sapratyayo nāhetuko nāpratyaya ityucyate /
SA11bsa054_u:2100_4: peyālaṃ / atha ca punarayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāmutpadyate /
SA11bsa054_u:2100_7: tatra bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandhaḥ katamaḥ? yadidaṃ bījādaṅkuraḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:2100_8: aṅkurāt patram, patrāt kāṇḍam, kāṇḍānnālam, nālādgaṇḍaḥ, gaṇḍādgarbham, garbhācchūkaḥ, śūkāt puṣpam, puṣpāt phalamiti / asati bīje 'ṅkuro na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:2100_13: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījenābhinirvartita iti /
SA11bsa054_u:2100_14: evaṃ yāvat puṣpasya naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ phalamabhinirvartayāmīti,
SA11bsa054_u:2100_17: evaṃ yāvat puṣpe sati phalasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati prādurbhāvaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2101_0: kathaṃ bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ? ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt /
SA11bsa054_u:2101_1: katameṣāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt? yadidaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśaṛtusamavāyāt bāhyasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2101_10: tadā sarveṣāṃ [Bcp_270] samavāyāt bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:2101_11: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya saṃdhāraṇākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA11bsa054_u:2101_12: evaṃ yāvadṛtorapi naivaṃ bhavati- ahaṃ bījasya pariṇāmanākṛtyaṃ karomīti /
SA11bsa054_u:2101_13: aṅkurasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati- ahamebhiḥ pratyayairjanita iti /
SA11bsa054_u:2101_14: atha punaḥ satsu eteṣu bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:2101_15: sa cāyamaṅkuro na svayaṃkṛto na parakṛto nobhayakṛto neśvaranirmito na kālapariṇāmito na prakṛtisaṃbhūto na caikakāraṇādhīno nāpyahetusamutpannaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2102_1: katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ? na śāśvatato nocchedato na saṃkrāntitaḥ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataśceti /
SA11bsa054_u:2102_3: na ca yadeva bījaṃ sa evāṅkuraḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2102_5: aṅkuraścotpadyate / ato na śāśvatataḥ / kathaṃ nocchedataḥ? na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate,
SA11bsa054_u:2102_6: nāpyaniruddhādbījāt, api ca, bījaṃ ca nirudhyate, tasminneva samaye 'ṅkura utpadyate,
SA11bsa054_u:2102_7: tulādaṇḍonnāmāvanāmavat / ato nocchedataḥ / kathaṃ na saṃkrāntitaḥ? visadṛśo bījādaṅkura iti /
SA11bsa054_u:2102_8: ato na saṃkrāntitaḥ / kathaṃ parīttahetuto vipulaphalābhinirvṛttitaḥ? parīttabījamupyate,
SA11bsa054_u:2102_11: kathaṃ tatsadṛśānuprabandhataḥ? yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśaṃ phalamabhinirvartayatīti /
SA11bsa054_u:2104_4: pratītyasamutpādo 'pi yathāvadevaṃ saṃgacchate iti traikālyavādimatamāśaṅkayāha anyata ityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:2105_0: anyato nāpi cāyātaṃ na tiṣṭhati na gacchati /
SA11bsa054_u:2106_0: anyato deśakālāt / nāyātaṃ nāgataṃ kiṃcit / nāpyāgataṃ sat vartamānādadhvanaḥ kvacidgacchati /
SA11bsa054_u:2106_3: vartamānādvā atitam, tadā saṃskṛtamapi nityaṃ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:2106_4: sarvadā vidyamānatvāt / nānityaṃ nāmāsti, sa ca dharmo na ca nityaḥ iti kathametat setsyati?
SA11bsa054_u:2107_0: atha pūrvāparakālayoḥ kāritraśūnyatayā dharmasya adhvasu viśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2107_1: tathā hi yadā asaṃprāptakāritraḥ kṛtyaṃ na karoti,
SA11bsa054_u:2107_2: tadā anāgato 'bhidhīyate, yadā karoti tadā pratyutpannaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:2107_3: yadā tu kṛtyānnivṛttaḥ tadā atīta iti viśeṣaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2107_4: etadapi na kiṃcit / tenaivātmanā tasyaiva [Bcp_271] tadāpi sadbhāvāt kāritramapi kathaṃ na syāditi vaktavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:2107_7: kāritraṃ vā kathamatītamanāgataṃ pratyutpannaṃ ca ucyate? kiṃ tadaparakāritrasadbhāvāt svayameva vā? pūrvatra anavasthānam,
SA11bsa054_u:2107_8: pāścātye ca dharmasyāpi svayamatītatvādivyavasthāyāṃ na kiṃcit kṣīyate /
SA11bsa054_u:2107_10: tathā atītamanāgataṃ cāsti, tadā naivam / svabhāvena sato dharmasya kathamanutpannavinaṣṭasvabhāvatā? kimasya pūrvaṃ nāsīt yasyābhāvādajāta ityucyate? kiṃ ca paścānnāsti yasyābhāvādvinaṣṭa iti? tenaiva cātmanā pūrvāparakālayoravasthāne vartamānavadupalabdhyādiprasaṅgaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2108_0: svabhāvaḥ sarvadā nāsti bhāvo nityaśca neṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:2109_3: astyanāgatam, iti / atītaṃ tu yadabhūtapūrvamutpadya vinaṣṭam,
SA11bsa054_u:2109_5: evaṃ hi hetvādyastītyucyate, astiśabdasya nipātatvāt kālatrayavṛttitvam /
SA11bsa054_u:2111_0: yadi ca anāgataṃ cakṣuḥ syāt, noktaṃ syādabhūtvā bhavatīti /
SA11bsa054_u:2111_1: tasmānnādhvasaṃkrāntirasti / yadi caivam, na kutaścidāgamanam, kvacid gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate,
SA11bsa054_u:2111_2: pratibhāsamānasya ca pratyutpannasya na rūpaṃ kiṃcidvicāreṇāvatiṣṭhate,
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.143_0: māyātaḥ ko viśeṣo 'sya yanmūḍhaiḥ satyataḥ kṛtam //
SA11bsa054_u:2112_0: māyātaḥ aindrajālikanirmitahastyādirūpāyā api niḥsvabhāvatayā viśeṣo naiva kaścit asya hetupratyayopajanitasya vasturūpasya paridṛśyamānasya /
SA11bsa054_u:2113_0: kathaṃ na viśeṣaḥ? punaridameva vyaktīkurvannāha māyayetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.144_1: āyāti tatkutaḥ kutra yāti ceti nirūpyatām //
SA11bsa054_u:2114_2: tayā nirmitam, yacca vasturūpaṃ māyāhetunā māyāsvabhāvena yadviracitamiti yāvat /
SA11bsa054_u:2114_5: āyāti āgacchati / tanmāyānimirtaṃ hetunirmitaṃ vā vasturūpaṃ [Bcp_272] kutaḥ kasmāt? kutra yāti ca,
SA11bsa054_u:2114_6: vinaṣṭaṃ sat kva punaretad gacchati? ityevaṃ nirūpyatāṃ sūkṣmekṣikayā vicāryatām,
SA11bsa054_u:2114_7: yadi tasya kutaścidāgacchati kvacid gacchati vā upalabhyate /
SA11bsa054_u:2115_1: tadā kathamiva alīkaṃ syāt? ata eva alīkamityāha yadanyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:2116_1: na tadabhāvataḥ, tasya anyasya abhāvataḥ na dṛṣṭam,
SA11bsa054_u:2116_2: tatparādhīnavṛttitvāt / pratibimbasame pratibimbena ādarśamaṇḍalapratibhāsinā mukhādisādṛśyena tulye /
SA11bsa054_u:2116_5: evaṃbhūte vasturūpe kṛtrime parāyattavṛttitayā asvābhāvike satyatā amṛṣārthatā kutaḥ? naiva yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:2117_0: hetutaḥ saṃbhavo yeṣāṃ tadabhāvānna santi ye /
SA11bsa054_u:2117_1: kathaṃ nāma na te spaṣṭaṃ pratibimbasamā matāḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:2118_1: na ca hetupratyayānāṃ sāmarthyaṃ kvacidapi paramārthataḥ saṃbhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:2119_1: avidyamāno vā, ubhayasvabhāvo vā? tatra na vidyamānaḥ kriyate ityāha vidyamānasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:2121_0: vidyamānasya kāraṇavyāpārāt prāgeva satsvabhāvasya hetunā kāraṇena kiṃ prayojanam? kāryasya niṣpannātmakatayā nirvartyasvabhāvābhāvāt hetuvyāpārasyānupayogāt /
SA11bsa054_u:2122_2: tarhi hetunā kiṃ prayojanam? tadāpi na hetunā kimapi prayojanamasti,
SA11bsa054_u:2123_0: syādetat- yadi nāma vidyamānasya niṣpannatvāt kartavyābhāvāt na hetunā kimapi prayojanam,
SA11bsa054_u:2123_1: avidyamānasya tu kiṃ na bhavatītyāha nābhāvasyetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:2125_6: mā bhavatu vikāraḥ, bhāvasvabhāvatā kevalamasyāstu cedatrāha tadavastha iti-
SA11bsa054_u:2127_1: nābhāva eva bhāvo bhavati, kevalamabhāvasvabhāvatānivṛttau bhāvasvabhāvo bhavati /
SA11bsa054_u:2128_1: ko vā tarhi abhāvādanyaḥ aparaḥ bhāvatām,
SA11bsa054_u:2128_2: abhāvasvabhāvatāṃ parityajya bhāvarūpatāṃ gataḥ? nānyaḥ kaścit pratīyate,
SA11bsa054_u:2129_1: kiṃ tarhi prāgabhāvasya bhāvavirodhinaḥ sadbhāvāttadā bhāvo na bhavati,
SA11bsa054_u:2131_1: yadi bhāvo na bhavati, kadā bhāvo bhaviṣyati? abhāvakāle bhāvasyānutpattiścet,
SA11bsa054_u:2131_4: tenaivotpadyamānena bhāvena abhāvasya vināśo bhaviṣyatīti cedāha-
SA11bsa054_u:2132_0: yāvadasau bhāvo na jāyate, tāvadabhāvasya vināśo nāstyeva /
SA11bsa054_u:2132_1: hiryasmāt / tasmāt na ajātena anutpannena bhāvena so 'bhāvaḥ prāgabhāvarūpaḥ apagamiṣyati nivartayiṣyate /
SA11bsa054_u:2133_0: athāpi syāt- mā apagacchatu nāma abhāvaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:2133_2: utpanne ca bhāve bhāvābhāvayoḥ parasparaparihārāt paścādabhāvaḥ svayameva apagamiṣyatītyāha na cetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:2135_0: bhavatyeva kramaḥ, yadi pūrvaṃ bhāva eva bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:2135_1: na caitadasti / co yasmāt / na caiva anapagate anivṛtte abhāve bhāvasyāvasaraḥ avakāśaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:2135_10: tasmādbhāvātmani abhāvātmani vā kārye na kāraṇasya vyāpāro yujyate /
SA11bsa054_u:2135_11: ubhayānubhayapakṣe ca pratyekapakṣaniṣedhādeva kāraṇavyāpārasya niṣedhaḥ kṛto bhavatīti draṣṭavyam /
SA11bsa054_u:2135_12: nāpi tayoḥ saṃbhavo 'sti / virodhinorekatra ekadā vidhipratiṣedhayorbhāvāyogāt /
SA11bsa054_u:2136_1: na sannutpadyate bhāvo nāpyasan sadasanna ca /
SA11bsa054_u:2136_2: na svato nāpi parato na dvābhyāṃ jāyate katham //
SA11bsa054_u:2137_0: evaṃ tāvadbhāvasyotpattiḥ paramārthato na kathaṃcidapi saṃgacchate /
SA11bsa054_u:2137_1: nāpi kathaṃcidutpannasya satsvabhāvasya nivṛttiryujyate ityāha bhāvaścetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:2138_0: pūrvāpekṣaścakāraḥ / yathā abhāvo bhāvatāṃ naiti, tathā bhāvaśca abhāvatāṃ naiti,
SA11bsa054_u:2138_3: tadā ca ekasyaiva vastunaḥ dvayoḥ svabhāvayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ syāt,
SA11bsa054_u:2138_5: na ca bhāvatāṃ parityajya abhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti vaktumucitam /
SA11bsa054_u:2138_6: tadā ca bhāvasyaivābhāvāt ko 'bhāvarūpatāṃ yātīti na vidmaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2139_0: itthaṃ bhāvasyotpādavināśayoḥ paramārthato 'bhāvaṃ prasādhya upasaṃharannāha evamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:2140_0: evaṃ na ca nirodho 'sti na ca bhāvo 'sti sarvadā /
SA11bsa054_u:2141_1: co hetau / yasmānna nirodho 'sti, na vināśo 'sti, [na ca bhāvo 'sti,] na vastusattvamasti / caḥ samuccaye / sarvadā sarvasmin kāle / "utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasamatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā dharmadhātuḥ tathatā avitathatā" /
SA11bsa054_u:2142_2: sarvamaśeṣam / idaṃ niḥsvabhāvatāsamānādhikaraṇaṃ jagadviścaṃ sattvabhājanalokasaṃjñitaṃ sacarācaraṃ vā /
SA11bsa054_u:2143_1: sā ca śūnyatā notpadyate na nirudhyate āha- yadi evaṃ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
SA11bsa054_u:2143_3: na nirotsyante / nirārambho bodhisattvaḥ / āha- evametat kulaputra, yathābhisaṃbudhyase / sarvadharmā notpadyante, na nirudhyante / āha- yadetaduktaṃ bhagavatā saṃskṛtā dharmā utpadyante nirudhyante ca ityasya tathāgatabhāṣitasya ko 'bhiprāyaḥ? āha- utpādanirodhābhiniviṣṭaḥ kulaputra lokasaṃniveśaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2143_4: tatra tathāgato mahākārūṇiko lokasya trāsapadaparihārārthaṃ vyavahāravaśāduktavān utpadyante nirudhyante ca /
SA11bsa054_u:2143_5: na cātra kasyaciddharmasya utpādo na nirodhaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2144_2: iti jagato niḥsvabhāvatāyāṃ tadantargatānāṃ narakādigatīnāmapi niḥsvabhāvataivetyupadarśayannāha svapnetyādi-
SA11bsa054_u:2146_0: svapnena upamā tulyaṃ yāsāṃ tāḥ tathoktāḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2146_4: na tu tattvataḥ / katham? vicāre kadalīsamāḥ / hetupadametat / sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā vicāre vimarśe sati yasmāt kadalīsamāḥ kadalīvanniḥsārāḥ gatayaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:2149_3: na saṃbhavati / kutaḥ? vastutaḥ paramārthataḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatayā prakṛtiparinirvṛtatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:2150_1: ātmanaśca pareṣāṃ ca samatā tena te matā //
SA11bsa054_u:2151_0: iti paramārthatattvāparijñānānmithyābhiniveśādāropitajagajjālamupakalpya ātmanaiva ātmānamākulayati bālajanaḥ ityupadarśayannāha evamityādi-
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.152_0: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdhaṃ kiṃ hṛtaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.152_1: satkṛtaḥ paribhūto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati //
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.153_0: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.153_1: kā tṛṣṇā kutra sā tṛṣṇā mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ //
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.154_0: vicāre jīvalokaḥ kaḥ ko nāmātra mariṣyati /
SA11bsa054_u:bca_9.154_1: ko bhaviṣyati ko bhūtaḥ ko bandhuḥ kasya kaḥ suhṛt //
SA11bsa054_u:2152_0: evaṃ pratipāditanyāyena śūnyeṣu niḥsvabhāveṣu dharmeṣu kiṃ labdham,
SA11bsa054_u:2152_1: kiṃ kutaścit prāptaṃ yallābheṣu prahṛṣyanti? kiṃ hṛtam,
SA11bsa054_u:2152_4: paribhūtaḥ apakṛto vā kena kaḥ saṃbhaviṣyati? vastusvabhāvābhāve na kaścit kenacidityarthaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2153_1: kuto duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhahetorabhāvāt? anyonyasamuccayārtha ubhayatra vāśabdaḥ /
SA11bsa054_u:2153_3: kiṃ priyaṃ vā kiṃ vallabhaṃ vā? priyarūpatāyāḥ kalpitatvāt /
SA11bsa054_u:2153_4: kimapriyaṃ kimanabhilaṣaṇīyam? apriyamapi na paramārthataḥ kiṃcit vidyate,
SA11bsa054_u:2153_5: iti kimarthaṃ priyāpriyasaṃyogaviyogārthaṃ prayatnaḥ kriyate? kā tṛṣṇā yayā lābhādyarthaṃ tṛṣyati janaḥ? kutra sā tṛṣṇā,
SA11bsa054_u:2153_6: kva punarāsaṅgasthāne vastuni tṛṣṇā? mṛgyamāṇā svabhāvataḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:2153_7: anviṣyamāṇā svarūpataḥ / tadviṣayasyābhāvāt nirviṣayatayā tasyā apyabhāvaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:2154_0: vicāre paramārthasvarūpanirūpaṇe sati jīvalokaḥ sattvalokaḥ kaḥ? naiva kaścit /
SA11bsa054_u:2154_1: tadabhāvāt ko nāmātra mariṣyati? jīvalokasya vicāreṇa asatsvabhāvatvāt ko nāmātra jīvaloke mariṣyati,
SA11bsa054_u:2154_3: ka utpatsyate? ko bhūtaḥ pūrvamutpannaḥ? ityatītādivyavahāraḥ kālpanika eva /
SA11bsa054_u:2154_4: ko bandhuḥ, kaḥ svajanaḥ? kasya kaḥ suhṛt,
SA11bsa054_u:2154_5: kiṃ mitraṃ kasya? atreti sarvatra yojanīyam /
SA11bsa054_u:2156_1: parigṛhṇantu avidyamānameva tu svarūpamāropya madvidhā iti granthakāraḥ ātmānameva nidarśanaṃ karoti /
SA11bsa054_u:2157_1: tacca bhagavatā śūnyataḥ sudṛṣṭaṃ suviditaṃ susākṣātkṛtam /
SA11bsa054_u:2157_2: tena sarvajña ityucyate / tatra saṃvṛtirlokapracāratastathāgatena dṛṣṭā /
SA11bsa054_u:2157_3: yaḥ punaḥ paramārthaḥ, so 'nabhilāpyaḥ anājñeyo 'vijñeyaḥ adeśitaḥ aprakāśitaḥ,
SA11bsa054_u:2157_4: yāvat akriyaḥ akaraṇaḥ, yāvat na lābho nālābho na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ na yaśo nāyaśaḥ na rūpaṃ nārūpamityādi /
SA11bsa054_u:2158_0: tatra jinena janasya kṛtena saṃvṛti deśita lokahitāya /
